atk-s0504a:127_4: Yasmā pana mahākāruṇikassa bhagavato veneyyagatā ca kilesā paṭipakkhā,
atk-s0504a:127_6: Atha vā bhagavato sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhā titthiyā,
atk-s0504a:127_8: Te hi diṭṭhiharaṇavasena diṭṭhippakāsane asamatthabhāvena ca iddhiādesanānusāsanīhi haritā apanītā honti.
atk-s0504a:127_10: Tasmā samāhite citte vigatūpakkilese katakiccena pacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti paṭihāriyaṃ.
atk-s0504a:127_11: Attano vā upakkilesesu catutthajjhānamaggehi haritesu pacchā haraṇaṃ paṭihāriyaṃ.
atk-s0504a:127_12: Iddhiādesanānusāsaniyo ca vigatūpakkilesena katakiccena sattahitatthaṃ puna pavattetabbā,
atk-s0504a:127_13: haritesu ca attano upakkilesesu parasantāne upakkilesaharaṇāni hontīti paṭihāriyāni bhavanti.
atk-s0504a:127_15: paṭihāriye vā iddhiādesanānusāsanisamudāye bhavaṃ ekekaṃ pāṭihāriyanti vuccati.
atk-s0504a:127_16: Paṭihāriyaṃ vā catutthajjhānaṃ maggo ca paṭipakkhaharaṇato,
atk-s0504a:128_1: anupacitasambhārehi sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo dukkhogāḷhā alabbhaneyyappatiṭṭhā ca.
atk-s0504a:128_2: Tasmā tehi catūhi gambhīrabhāvehi yuttanti dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhagambhīraṃ.
atk-s0504a:129_0: Eko eva bhagavato dhammadesanāghoso ekasmiṃ khaṇe pavattamāno nānābhāsānaṃ sattānaṃ attano attano bhāsāvasena
atk-s0504a:129_1: apubbaṃ acarimaṃ gahaṇūpago hutvā atthādhigamāya hoti.
atk-s0504a:129_2: Acinteyyo hi buddhānaṃ buddhānubhāvoti sabbasattānaṃ sakasakabhāsānurūpato sotapathamāgacchatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:130_2: na mayā idaṃ sacchikata”nti attānaṃ parimocento –
atk-s0504a:130_4: mayāpi evaṃ suta”nti idāni vattabbaṃ sakalaṃ suttaṃ nidasseti.
atk-s0504a:131_3: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando,
atk-s0504a:131_8: “āyasmā ānando atthakusalo dhammakusalo byañjanakusalo niruttikusalo pubbāparakusalo”ti evaṃ dhammasenāpatinā
atk-s0504a:131_9: ca pasatthabhāvānurūpaṃ attano dhāraṇabalaṃ dassento sattānaṃ sotukamyataṃ janeti –
atk-s0504a:131_11: tañca kho atthato vā byañjanato vā anūnamanadhikaṃ, evameva,
atk-s0504a:131_17: sā na sabbākārena sakkā viññātunti vuttovāyamattho.
atk-s0504a:131_19: Na hettha atthantaratāparihāro dvinnampi atthānaṃ ekavisayattā.
atk-s0504a:131_20: Itarathā hi thero bhagavato desanāya sabbathā paṭiggahaṇe samattho asamatthoti vā āpajjeyyāti.
atk-s0504a:132_5: bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu mayhanti attho.
atk-s0504a:132_9: Idha pana “mayā suta”nti ca “mama suta”nti ca atthadvaye yujjati.
atk-s0504a:133_0: Ettha ca yo paro na hoti,
atk-s0504a:133_1: so attāti evaṃ vattabbe niyakajjhattasaṅkhāte sakasantāne vattanato tividhopi me-
atk-s0504a:134_4: saddo eva taṃ taṃ atthaṃ vadatīti anupasaggassa sutasaddassa atthuddhāre saupasaggopi udāharīyati.
atk-s0504a:135_7: Idha panassa “sotadvārānusārena upadhārita”nti vā “upadhāraṇa”nti vā attho. Me-
atk-s0504a:135_8: saddassa hi mayāti atthe sati “iti me sutaṃ,
atk-s0504a:135_10: Mamāti atthe sati “iti mama sutaṃ sotadvārānusārena upadhāraṇa”nti attho.
atk-s0504a:136_0: Evametesu tīsu padesu yasmā sutasaddasannidhāne payuttena itisaddena savanakiriyājotakena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:136_5: Yathā hi sutaṃ sutamevāti vattabbataṃ arahati,
atk-s0504a:136_6: taṃ sammā sutaṃ anūnaggahaṇaṃ aviparītaggahaṇañca hotīti.
atk-s0504a:136_7: Atha vā saddantaratthāpohanavasena saddo atthaṃ vadatīti,
atk-s0504a:136_8: yasmā sutanti etassa asutaṃ na hotīti ayamattho,
atk-s0504a:136_17: Avadhāraṇatthe vā itisadde ayamatthayojanāti tadapekkhassa suta-
atk-s0504a:136_20: Evaṃ savanahetusavanavisesavasena padattayassa atthayojanā katāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:137_0: Tathā itīti sotadvārānusārena pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇato nānappakārena ārammaṇe
atk-s0504a:137_5: nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā kāraṇabhūtāya mayā na aññaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0504a:138_2: Tasmā itisaddena sakalampi sutaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:138_7: Na hi puggalavohārarahite dhammappabandhe savanakiriyā labbhati.
atk-s0504a:139_0: Tathā itīti yassa cittasantānassa nānārammaṇappavattiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0504a:139_2: Itīti hi ayaṃ ākārapaññatti dhammānaṃ taṃ taṃ pavattiākāraṃ upādāya paññāpetabbasabhāvattā.
atk-s0504a:139_5: Sotabbo hi dhammo savanakiriyākattupuggalassa savanakiriyāvasena pavattiṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0504a:139_6: Ettāvatā nānappakārappavattena cittasantānena taṃsamaṅgino kattu visaye gahaṇasanniṭṭhānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0504a:140_1: Sutānañhi dhammānaṃ gahitākārassa nidassanassa avadhāraṇassa vā pakāsanabhāvena itisaddena tadākārādidhāraṇassa
atk-s0504a:140_4: Puggalavādinopi hi savanakiriyā viññāṇanirapekkhā na hotīti.
atk-s0504a:140_9: mayā savanakiccaviññāṇasamaṅginā puggalena viññāṇavasena laddhassavanakiccavohārena sutanti.
atk-s0504a:141_0: Tathā itīti ca meti ca saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena avijjamānapaññatti.
atk-s0504a:141_1: Sabbassa hi saddādhigamanīyassa atthassa paññattimukheneva paṭipajjitabbattā sabbapaññattīnañca vijjamānādīsu chasveva paññattīsu avarodho,
atk-s0504a:141_3: anussavādīhi gahetabbo viya anuttamattho ca na hoti.
atk-s0504a:141_4: So rūpasaddādiko ruppanānubhavanādiko ca paramatthasabhāvo saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena vijjati.
atk-s0504a:141_5: Yo pana itīti ca meti ca vuccamāno ākārādiaparamatthasabhāvo saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena anupalabbhamāno avijjamānapaññatti nāma,
atk-s0504a:141_7: yaṃ itīti vā meti vā niddesaṃ labhetha.
atk-s0504a:142_0: Tathā itīti sotapathamāgate dhamme upādāya tesaṃ upadhāritākārādīnaṃ paccāmasanavasena.
atk-s0504a:142_1: Meti sasantatipariyāpanne khandhe karaṇādivisesavisiṭṭhe upādāya vattabbato upādāpaññatti.
atk-s0504a:142_4: tatiyanti ādiko viya paṭhamādiṃ nissāya “yaṃ na diṭṭhamutaviññātanirapekkhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:142_5: taṃ suta”nti viññeyyattā diṭṭhādīni upanidhāya vattabbo hoti.
atk-s0504a:142_6: Asutaṃ na hotīti hi sutanti pakāsitoyamatthoti.
atk-s0504a:143_0: Ettha ca itīti vacanena asammohaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0504a:143_1: Paṭividdhā hi atthassa pakāravisesā itīti idha āyasmatā ānandena paccāmaṭṭhā,
atk-s0504a:143_4: lobhappahānādivasena nānappakārā duppaṭividdhā ca suttatthā niddisīyanti.
atk-s0504a:143_5: Sutanti vacanena asammosaṃ dīpeti sutākārassa yāthāvato dassiyamānattā yassa hi sutaṃ sammuṭṭhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0504a:143_6: na so kālantare mayā sutanti paṭijānāti.
atk-s0504a:143_7: Iccassa asammohena sammohābhāvena paññāya eva vā savanakālasambhūtāya taduttarikālapaññāsiddhi,
atk-s0504a:143_11: yathāsutadhāraṇameva tattha karaṇīyanti satiyā byāpāro adhiko,
atk-s0504a:143_12: paññā tattha guṇībhūtā hoti paññāya pubbaṅgamāti katvā.
atk-s0504a:143_14: Atthassa hi paṭivijjhitabbo ākāro gambhīroti paññāya byāpāro adhiko,
atk-s0504a:143_15: sati tattha guṇībhūtā hoti satiyā pubbaṅgamāti katvā.
atk-s0504a:144_2: Tena vuccamānānaṃ ākāranidassanāvadhāraṇatthānaṃ upari vakkhamānānaṃ nānappakārappaṭivedhajotakānaṃ aviparītasaddhammavisayattā.
atk-s0504a:144_3: Na hi ayoniso manasikaroto nānappakārappaṭivedho sambhavati.
atk-s0504a:144_5: nidānapucchāvasena pakaraṇappattassa vakkhamānassa suttassa savanaṃ na samādhānamantarena sambhavati vikkhittacittassa savanābhāvato.
atk-s0504a:144_6: Tathā hi vikkhittacitto puggalo sabbasampattiyā vuccamānopi “na mayā sutaṃ,
atk-s0504a:144_9: sammā appaṇihitattassa pubbe akatapuññassa vā tadabhāvato.
atk-s0504a:144_12: Na hi vikkhittacitto saddhammaṃ sotuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0504a:144_13: na ca sappurise anupassayamānassa savanaṃ atthi.
atk-s0504a:145_3: Yasmā ca so bhagavato vacanassa atthabyañjanappabhedaparicchedavasena sakalasāsanasampatiogāhanena niravasesaparahitapāripūrikāraṇabhūto
atk-s0504a:145_4: evaṃbhaddako ākāro na sammā appaṇihitattano pubbe akatapuññassa vā hoti,
atk-s0504a:145_5: tasmā itīti iminā bhaddakena ākārena pacchimacakkadvayasampattimattano dīpeti,
atk-s0504a:145_7: Na hi appatirūpe dese vasato sappurisūpanissayarahitassa vā savanaṃ atthi.
atk-s0504a:145_9: sammā paṇihitatto pubbe ca katapuñño visuddhāsayo hoti,
atk-s0504a:145_13: seyyaso naṃ tato kare”ti “katapuññosi tvaṃ, ānanda,
atk-s0504a:145_17: Patirūpadesavāsena hi sappurisūpanissayena ca sādhūnaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanenapi visuddhappayogo hoti.
atk-s0504a:145_19: pubbe eva taṇhādiṭṭhisaṃkilesānaṃ visodhitattā payogasuddhiyā āgamabyattisiddhi.
atk-s0504a:145_20: Suparisuddhakāyavacīpayogo hi vippaṭisārābhāvato avikkhittacitto pariyattiyaṃ visārado hoti.
atk-s0504a:145_21: Iti payogāsayasuddhassa āgamādhigamasampannassa vacanaṃ aruṇuggamanaṃ viya sūriyassa udayato,
atk-s0504a:145_23: arahati bhagavato vacanassa pubbaṅgamaṃ bhavitunti ṭhāne nidānaṃ ṭhapento iti me sutantiādimāha.
atk-s0504a:146_1: itīti iminā pubbe vuttanayena nānappakārappaṭivedhadīpakena attano atthapaṭibhānapaṭisambhidāsampattisabbhāvaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0504a:146_2: Sutanti iminā itisaddasannidhānato vakkhamānāpekkhāya vā sotabbabhedappaṭivedhadīpakena dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāsampattisabbhāvaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0504a:146_3: Itīti ca idaṃ vuttanayeneva yonisomanasikāradīpakaṃ vacanaṃ bhāsamāno “ete mayā dhammā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā”ti dīpeti.
atk-s0504a:146_7: ettakā ettha anusandhiyo”tiādinā nayena manasā anupekkhitā anussavākāraparivitakkasahitāya dhammanijjhānakkhantibhūtāya
atk-s0504a:146_8: ñātapariññāsaṅkhātāya vā diṭṭhiyā tattha tattha vuttarūpārūpadhamme “iti rūpaṃ,
atk-s0504a:146_9: ettakaṃ rūpa”ntiādinā nayena suṭṭhu vavatthapetvā paṭividdhā attano paresañca hitasukhāvahā hontīti.
atk-s0504a:146_10: Suttanti idaṃ savanayogaparidīpakavacanaṃ bhāsamāno “bahū mayā dhammā sutā dhātā vacasā paricitā”ti dīpeti.
atk-s0504a:146_12: Tadubhayenapi dhammassa svākkhātabhāvena atthabyañjanapāripūriṃ dīpento savane ādaraṃ janeti.
atk-s0504a:146_13: Atthabyañjanaparipuṇṇañhi dhammaṃ ādarena assuṇanto mahatā hitā paribāhiro hotīti ādaraṃ janetvā sakkaccaṃ dhammo sotabbo.
atk-s0504a:147_0: Iti me sutanti iminā pana sakalena vacanena āyasmā ānando tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ attano adahanto asappurisabhūmiṃ atikkamati,
atk-s0504a:147_5: tasseva pana bhagavato vacana”nti dīpento attānaṃ parimoceti,
atk-s0504a:148_0: Apica iti me sutanti attanā uppāditabhāvaṃ appaṭijānanto purimassavanaṃ vivaranto sammukhā paṭiggahitamidaṃ
atk-s0504a:148_1: mayā tassa bhagavato catuvesārajjavisāradassa dasabaladharassa āsabhaṭṭhānaṭṭhāyino sīhanādanādino sabbasattuttamassa
atk-s0504a:148_2: dhammissarassa dhammarājassa dhammādhipatino dhammadīpassa dhammasaraṇassa saddhammavaracakkavattino
atk-s0504a:148_4: Na ettha atthe vā dhamme vā pade vā byañjane vā kaṅkhā vā vimati vā kātabbāti sabbadevamanussānaṃ imasmiṃ dhammavinaye assaddhiyaṃ vināseti,
atk-s0504a:151_1: “kasmā panettha yathā aññesu suttesu ‘evaṃ me sutaṃ,
atk-s0504a:151_2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā’tiādinā kāladese apadisitvāva nidānaṃ bhāsitaṃ,
atk-s0504a:151_6: Idañhi nidānaṃ na āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamaṃ bhāsitaṃ khujjuttarāya pana bhagavatā upāsikāsu bahussutabhāvena
atk-s0504a:151_7: etadagge ṭhapitāya sekkhappaṭisambhidāppattāya ariyasāvikāya sāmāvatippamukhānaṃ pañcannaṃ itthisatānaṃ
atk-s0504a:152_1: ito kira kappasatasahassamatthake padumuttaro nāma sammāsambuddho loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko haṃsavatiyaṃ viharati.
atk-s0504a:152_2: Athekadivasaṃ haṃsavatiyaṃ ekā kuladhītā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sotuṃ gacchantīhi upāsikāhi saddhiṃ ārāmaṃ gatā.
atk-s0504a:152_3: Satthāraṃ ekaṃ upāsikaṃ bahussutānaṃ etadagge ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikāraṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0504a:152_4: Satthāpi naṃ byākāsi “anāgate gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ bahussutānaṃ aggā bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:152_5: Tassā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devaloke nibbattitvā puna manussesūti evaṃ devamanussesu saṃsarantiyā kappasatasahassaṃ atikkantaṃ.
atk-s0504a:152_6: Atha imasmiṃ bhaddakappe amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sā devalokato cavitvā ghosakaseṭṭhissa gehe dāsiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0504a:152_8: Sā jātakāle khujjā ahosīti khujjuttarātveva paññāyittha.
atk-s0504a:152_9: Sā aparabhāge ghosakaseṭṭhinā rañño utenassa sāmāvatiyā dinnakāle tassā paricārikabhāvena dinnā rañño utenassa antepure vasati.
atk-s0504a:153_0: Tena ca samayena kosambiyaṃ ghosakaseṭṭhikukkuṭaseṭṭhipāvārikaseṭṭhino bhagavantaṃ uddissa tayo vihāre
atk-s0504a:153_1: kāretvā janapadacārikaṃ carante tathāgate kosambinagaraṃ sampatte buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0504a:153_6: aññesampi okāsaṃ dassāmā”ti kosambinagaravāsinopi janassa okāsaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0504a:153_7: Tato paṭṭhāya nāgarā vīthisabhāgena gaṇasabhāgena mahādānaṃ denti.
atk-s0504a:153_8: Athekadivasaṃ satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto mālākārajeṭṭhakassa gehe nisīdi.
atk-s0504a:153_9: Tasmiṃ khaṇe khujjuttarā sāmāvatiyā pupphāni gahetuṃ aṭṭha kahāpaṇe ādāya taṃ gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0504a:153_11: ajja tuyhaṃ pupphāni dātuṃ khaṇo natthi,
atk-s0504a:153_14: evaṃ ito paresaṃ veyyāvaccakaraṇato muccissasī”ti āha.
atk-s0504a:153_15: Tato khujjuttarā buddhānaṃ bhattagge veyyāvaccaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0504a:153_16: Sā satthārā upanisinnakathāvasena kathitaṃ sabbameva dhammaṃ uggaṇhi,
atk-s0504a:154_0: Sā aññesu divasesu cattārova kahāpaṇe datvā pupphāni gahetvā gacchati,
atk-s0504a:154_1: tasmiṃ pana divase diṭṭhasaccabhāvena parasantake cittaṃ anuppādetvā aṭṭhapi kahāpaṇe datvā pacchiṃ pūretvā
atk-s0504a:154_4: tvaṃ aññesu divasesu na bahūni pupphāni āharasi,
atk-s0504a:154_7: Sā musā vattuṃ abhabbatāya atīte attanā kataṃ anigūhitvā sabbaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0504a:154_8: Atha “kasmā ajja bahūni āharasī”ti ca vuttā “ajjāhaṃ sammāsambuddhassa dhammaṃ sutvā amataṃ sacchākāsiṃ,
atk-s0504a:154_11: ettakaṃ kālaṃ tayā gahite kahāpaṇe dehī”ti atajjetvā pubbahetunā codiyamānā “amma,
atk-s0504a:154_13: amhepi pāyehī”ti vatvā “tena hi maṃ nhāpehī”ti vutte soḷasahi gandhodakaghaṭehi nhāpetvā dve maṭṭhasāṭake dāpesi.
atk-s0504a:154_14: Sā ekaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā āsane nisīditvā vicitrabījaniṃ ādāya nīcāsanesu nisinnāni
atk-s0504a:154_15: pañca mātugāmasatāni āmantetvā sekhappaṭisambhidāsu ṭhatvā satthārā desitaniyāmeneva tāsaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0504a:154_18: ajja paṭṭhāya tvaṃ kiliṭṭhakammaṃ mā kari,
atk-s0504a:154_19: amhākaṃ mātuṭṭhāne ācariyaṭṭhāne ca patiṭṭhāhī”ti garuṭṭhāne ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0504a:155_1: Sā kira kassapasammāsambuddhakāle bārāṇasiyaṃ seṭṭhidhītā hutvā nibbattā.
atk-s0504a:155_2: Ekāya khīṇāsavattheriyā upaṭṭhākakulaṃ gatāya “etaṃ me ayye,
atk-s0504a:155_4: Therīpi “adentiyā mayi āghātaṃ uppādetvā niraye nibbattissati,
atk-s0504a:155_6: nirayasantāpato dāsibhāvo seyyo”ti anuddayaṃ paṭicca tassā vacanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0504a:155_7: Sā tena kammena pañca jātisatāni paresaṃ dāsīyeva hutvā nibbatti.

atk-s0504a:290_14: Yathā hi nīvaraṇabhāvena avijjā saṃkilesadhammānaṃ padhānabhūtā pubbaṅgamā ca,

atk-s0504a:290_16: Apica visesena avijjā nibbānasukhaṃ nivāretīti “nīvaraṇa”nti vuttā,
atk-s0504a:291_0: Dassanagamanantarāyakaraṇato vā vijjācaraṇavipakkhato dvayaṃ dvidhā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:291_1: Vijjāya hi ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā avijjā nibbānadassanassa aviparītadassanassa ca visesato antarāyakarā,
atk-s0504a:291_2: caraṇadhammānaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā taṇhā gamanassa sammāpaṭipattiyā antarāyakarāti;
atk-s0504a:291_3: evamayaṃ avijjāya nivuto andhīkato taṇhāya saṃvuto baddho assutavā puthujjano andho viya baddho mahākantāraṃ,
atk-s0504a:291_6: Avijjāgato hi puggalo bālabhāvena atthaṃ parihāpeti,
atk-s0504a:291_10: anatthañca karoti jānanto viya rogī asappāyasevī.
atk-s0504a:292_1: Visesena hi sammohassa balavabhāvato avijjākhettaṃ atīto addhā,
atk-s0504a:292_7: Teneva tāsaṃ pubbantāharaṇena aparantapaṭisandhānena cassa yathākkamaṃ mūlakāraṇatā dassitāti veditabbanti.
atk-s0504a:293_1: Taṇhā hi nirudakakantāre marīcikāya udakasaññā viya pipāsābhibhūtaṃ appaṭikāradukkhābhibhūtampi sattaṃ
atk-s0504a:293_2: assādasandassanavasena sahāyakiccaṃ karontī bhavādīsu anibbindaṃ katvā paribbhamāpeti,
atk-s0504a:293_4: Nanu ca aññepi kilesādayo bhavābhinibbattiyā paccayāva?
atk-s0504a:293_6: na pana tathā visesappaccayo yathā taṇhā.
atk-s0504a:293_7: Tathā hi sā kusalehi vinā akusalehi,
atk-s0504a:293_8: kāmāvacarādikusalehi ca vinā rūpāvacarādikusalehi bhavanibbattiyā visesappaccayo,
atk-s0504a:293_10: Itthabhāvaññathābhāvanti itthabhāvo ca aññathābhāvo ca itthabhāvaññathābhāvo.
atk-s0504a:293_14: Itthabhāvo vā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppanno attabhāvo,
atk-s0504a:294_1: taṇhaṃ dukkhassa sambhavanti etaṃ sakalavaṭṭadukkhassa sambhavaṃ samudayaṃ taṇhaṃ ādīnavaṃ ādīnavato ñatvāti attho.
atk-s0504a:294_2: Atha vā etamādīnavaṃ ñatvāti etaṃ yathāvuttaṃ saṃsāranātivattanaṃ ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ ñatvā.
atk-s0504a:294_3: Taṇhaṃ dukkhassa sambhavanti taṇhañca vuttanayena vaṭṭadukkhassa padhānakāraṇanti ñatvā.
atk-s0504a:294_6: paribbajeti evaṃ tīhi pariññāhi parijānanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā taṇhaṃ vigamento aggamaggena sabbaso vītataṇho vigatataṇho,
atk-s0504a:294_7: tato eva catūsu upādānesu kassacipi abhāvena āyatiṃ paṭisandhisaṅkhātassa vā ādānassa abhāvena anādāno,
atk-s0504a:294_8: sativepullappattiyā sabbattha satokāritāya sato bhinnakileso bhikkhu paribbaje careyya,
atk-s0504a:297_0: 16. Chaṭṭhe sekhassāti ettha kenaṭṭhena sekho? Sekkhadhammapaṭilābhato sekho. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:301_0: Yopi kalyāṇaputhujjano anulomappaṭipadāya paripūrakārī sīlasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū
atk-s0504a:301_1: jāgariyānuyogamanuyutto pubbarattāpararattaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto viharati –
atk-s0504a:301_2: “ajja vā sve vā aññataraṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ adhigamissāmī”ti,
atk-s0504a:301_4: Imasmiṃ atthe na paṭivijjhantova sekho adhippeto,
atk-s0504a:301_8: yvāyaṃ carati mānaso”ti ettha rāgo mānasanti vutto.
atk-s0504a:301_11: kālaṃ kayirā jane sutā”ti ettha arahattaṃ.
atk-s0504a:305_2: Tena patthayamānassāti taṃ yogakkhemaṃ gantukāmassa tanninnassa tappoṇassa tappabbhārassāti attho.
atk-s0504a:305_3: Viharatoti ekaṃ iriyāpathadukkhaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ harato.
atk-s0504a:305_4: Atha vā “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti adhimuccanto saddhāya viharatī”tiādinā niddesanayena cettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0504a:305_8: Na aññaṃ ekaṅgampi samanupassāmīti ettha ayaṃ saṅkhepattho –
atk-s0504a:305_10: ajjhattaṃ attano santāne samuṭṭhitaṃ kāraṇanti katvā aññaṃ ekakāraṇampi na samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ bahūpakāraṃ,
atk-s0504a:305_14: aniccānulomikena vā cittassa āvaṭṭanā anvāvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro.
atk-s0504a:306_4: Tattha yoniso manasi karontoti “idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ,
atk-s0504a:306_7: ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasacca”nti catūsu ariyasaccesu yoniso manasikāraṃ pavattento.
atk-s0504a:307_1: yadipi idaṃ suttaṃ avisesena sekkhapuggalavasena āgataṃ,
atk-s0504a:307_3: Yo catusaccakammaṭṭhāniko yogāvacaro “taṇhāvajjā tebhūmakā khandhā dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:307_6: nirodhasampāpako maggo”ti evaṃ pubbe eva ācariyasantike uggahitacatusaccakammaṭṭhāno.
atk-s0504a:307_7: So aparena samayena vipassanāmaggaṃ samāruḷho samāno tebhūmake khandhe “idaṃ dukkha”nti yoniso manasi karoti,
atk-s0504a:307_8: upāyena pathena samannāharati ceva vipassati ca.
atk-s0504a:307_10: Yā panāyaṃ tassa dukkhassa samuṭṭhāpikā purimabhavikā taṇhā,
atk-s0504a:307_13: ayañca samudayo idaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā nirujjhanti na pavattanti,
atk-s0504a:307_18: upāyena pathena samannāharati ceva vipassati ca.
atk-s0504a:308_5: āpodhātū”tiādinā nayena cattāri mahābhūtāni tadanusārena upādārūpāni ca pariggahetvā “ayaṃ rūpakkhandho”ti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0504a:308_6: Taṃ vavatthāpayato uppanne tadārammaṇe cittacetasikadhamme “ime cattāro arūpakkhandhā”ti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0504a:308_8: Te pana saṅkhepato nāmañca rūpañcāti dve bhāgā honti.
atk-s0504a:308_12: So tesaṃ paccayānañca paccayuppannānañca yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ vavatthapetvā “ime dhammā ahutvā bhavanti,
atk-s0504a:309_0: Evaṃ tilakkhaṇāni āropetvā vipassanto udayabbayañāṇuppattiyā uppanne obhāsādike vipassanupakkilese ‘amaggo’ti
atk-s0504a:309_1: udayabbayañāṇameva “ariyamaggassa upāyabhūto pubbabhāgamaggo”ti maggāmaggaṃ vavatthapetvā puna udayabbayañāṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:309_2: paṭipāṭiyā bhaṅgañāṇādīni ca uppādento sotāpattimaggādayo pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0504a:309_3: Tasmiṃ khaṇe cattāri saccāni ekappaṭivedheneva paṭivijjhati,
atk-s0504a:309_6: samudayaṃ pahānappaṭivedhena paṭivijjhanto sabbaṃ akusalaṃ pajahati,
atk-s0504a:309_7: nirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhanto maggaṃ bhāvanāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhanto sabbaṃ kusalaṃ bhāveti.
atk-s0504a:309_9: tasmiñca bhāvite sabbepi kusalā anavajjabodhipakkhiyadhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantīti.
atk-s0504a:309_10: Evaṃ yoniso manasi karonto akusalaṃ pajahati,
atk-s0504a:310_0: Yoniso manasikāroti gāthāya ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – sikkhati,
atk-s0504a:310_4: Tassa sekhassa bhikkhuno uttamatthassa arahattassa pattiyā adhigamāya yathā yoniso manasikāro,
atk-s0504a:310_5: evaṃ bahukāro bahūpakāro añño koci dhammo natthi. Kasmā?
atk-s0504a:310_6: Yasmā yoniso upāyena manasikāraṃ purakkhatvā padahaṃ catubbidhasammappadhānavasena padahanto,
atk-s0504a:310_7: khayaṃ dukkhassa pāpuṇe saṃkilesavaṭṭadukkhassa parikkhayaṃ pariyosānaṃ nibbānaṃ pāpuṇe adhigaccheyya,
atk-s0504a:313_3: hitassa vidhātā sabbākārena upakārako mitto hoti,
atk-s0504a:313_6: Tatrāyaṃ kalyāṇamitto pakatiyā saddhāsampanno hoti sīlasampanno sutasampanno cāgasampanno vīriyasampanno satisampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno.
atk-s0504a:313_8: tena sammāsambodhihetubhūtaṃ sattesu hitasukhesitaṃ na pariccajati,
atk-s0504a:313_9: sīlasampattiyā sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo hoti garu ca bhāvanīyo codako pāpagarahī vattā vacanakkhamo,
atk-s0504a:313_10: sutasampattiyā khandhāyatanasaccapaṭiccasamuppādādikānaṃ gambhīrānaṃ kathānaṃ kattā hoti,
atk-s0504a:313_11: cāgasampattiyā appiccho hoti santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho,
atk-s0504a:313_12: vīriyasampattiyā attano paresañca hitappaṭipattiyaṃ āraddhavīriyo hoti,
atk-s0504a:313_13: satisampattiyā upaṭṭhitassati hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā anussaritā,
atk-s0504a:313_16: So satiyā kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesanto paññāya sattānaṃ hitasukhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā
atk-s0504a:313_17: samādhinā tattha abyaggacitto hutvā vīriyena satte ahitato nisedhetvā ekantahite niyojeti.
atk-s0504a:315_0: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no cāṭṭhāne niyojako”ti. ;
atk-s0504a:316_3: kusalaṃ bhāvetīti kalyāṇamitto puggalo kalyāṇamittaṃ nissāya kammassakatāñāṇaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0504a:316_6: Taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tathāgate saddhaṃ paṭilabhati,
atk-s0504a:316_7: tena saddhāpaṭilābhena gharāvāsaṃ pahāya pabbajjaṃ anutiṭṭhati,
atk-s0504a:316_11: āraddhavīriyo viharati upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno pubbarattāpararattaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto,
atk-s0504a:316_12: nacirasseva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ariyamaggādhigamena sabbaṃ akusalaṃ samucchindati,
atk-s0504a:317_1: bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṃ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa ‘yaṃ sīlavā bhavissati,
atk-s0504a:318_1: kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa ‘yaṃ yāyaṃ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā ekantanibbidāya…pe…
atk-s0504a:318_12: Evarūpāya kathāya nikāmalābhī bhavissati akicchalābhī akasiralābhī’.
atk-s0504a:319_1: kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa ‘yaṃ āraddhavīriyo viharissati akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-s0504a:319_2: upasampadāya thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu’.
atk-s0504a:320_2: udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā”’ti.
atk-s0504a:322_1: kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccanti,
atk-s0504a:323_0: Tena vuttaṃ – “kalyāṇamitto, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāvetī”ti.
atk-s0504a:324_0: Gāthāya sappatissoti patissavasaṅkhātena saha patissenāti sappatisso,
atk-s0504a:324_1: kalyāṇamittassa ovādaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchako subbacoti attho.
atk-s0504a:324_2: Atha vā hitasukhe patiṭṭhāpanena pati isetīti patisso,
atk-s0504a:324_4: Garuādarayogena tena patissena saha vattatīti sappatisso,
atk-s0504a:324_7: Karaṃ mittānaṃ vacananti kalyāṇamittānaṃ ovādaṃ karonto yathovādaṃ paṭipajjanto.
atk-s0504a:324_12: tattha ca vipassanāpaṭipāṭiyā ceva maggapaṭipāṭiyā ca.
atk-s0504a:324_13: Sabbasaṃyojanakkhayanti kāmarāgasaṃyojanādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ khepanato sabbasaṃyojanakkhayasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0504a:324_17: Iti imesu dvīsu suttesu ariyamaggādhigamassa satthārā padhānaṅgaṃ nāma gahitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:327_4: devadatto hi ajātasattuṃ duggahaṇaṃ gāhāpetvā tassa pitaraṃ rājānaṃ bimbisāraṃ tena mārāpetvāpi abhimāre
atk-s0504a:327_5: payojetvāpi silāpavijjhanena lohituppādakammaṃ katvāpi na tāvatā pākaṭo jāto,
atk-s0504a:327_7: Atha mahājano “evarūpampi nāma pāpaṃ gahetvā rājā vicaratī”ti kolāhalaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0504a:327_9: Taṃ sutvā rājā attanā dīyamānāni pañca thālipākasatāni pacchindāpesi,
atk-s0504a:327_12: So parihīnalābhasakkāro kohaññena jīvitukāmo satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañca vatthūni yācitvā “alaṃ,
atk-s0504a:327_15: so āraññiko hotū”tiādinā bhagavatā paṭikkhitto tehi pañcahi vatthūhi bālaṃ lūkhappasannaṃ janaṃ saññāpento
atk-s0504a:327_16: pañcasate vajjiputtake salākaṃ gāhāpetvā saṅghaṃ bhinditvāva te ādāya gayāsīsaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0504a:327_17: Atha dve aggasāvakā satthu āṇāya tattha gantvā dhammaṃ desetvā te ariyaphale patiṭṭhāpetvā ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0504a:327_18: Ye panassa saṅghabhedāya parakkamantassa laddhiṃ rocetvā tatheva paggayha ṭhitā saṅghe bhijjante bhinne ca samanuññā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0504a:327_19: tesaṃ taṃ dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya ahosi.
atk-s0504a:328_0: Devadattopi na cirasseva rogābhibhūto bāḷhagilāno maraṇakāle “satthāraṃ vandissāmī”ti mañcakasivikāya
atk-s0504a:328_1: nīyamāno jetavanapokkharaṇitīre ṭhapito pathaviyā vivare dinne patitvā avīcimhi nibbatti,
atk-s0504a:328_2: yojanasatiko cassa attabhāvo ahosi kappaṭṭhiyo tālakkhandhaparimāṇehi ayasūlehi vinividdho.
atk-s0504a:328_3: Devadattapakkhikāni ca pañcamattāni kulasatāni tassa laddhiyaṃ ṭhitāni saha bandhavehi niraye nibbattāni.
atk-s0504a:328_5: devadattena saṅghaṃ bhindantena bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ kata”nti.
atk-s0504a:328_8: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte saṅghabhede ādīnavaṃ dassento imaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0504a:328_9: Keci pana bhaṇanti “devadattassa tappakkhikānañca tathā niraye nibbattabhāvaṃ disvā saṅghabhede ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0504a:328_10: dassento bhagavā attano ajjhāsayeneva imaṃ suttaṃ desesī”ti.
atk-s0504a:329_2: Uppajjamāno uppajjatīti ettha bhedasaṃvattanikesu bhaṇḍanādīsu saṅghe uppannesupi “dhammo adhammo”tiādīsu
atk-s0504a:329_3: aṭṭhārasabhedakaravatthūsu yassa kassaci dīpanavasena voharantesupi tattha rucijananatthaṃ anussāventesupi
atk-s0504a:329_4: anussāvetvā salākāya gāhitāyapi saṅghabhedo uppajjamāno nāma hoti,
atk-s0504a:329_5: salākāya pana gāhitāya cattāro vā atirekā vā yadā āveṇikaṃ uddesaṃ vā saṅghakammaṃ vā karonti,
atk-s0504a:329_7: Kate pana tasmiṃ saṅghabhedo uppanno nāma? Kammaṃ, uddeso, vohāro,
atk-s0504a:329_9: salākaggāhoti imesu hi pañcasu saṅghassa bhedakāraṇesu kammaṃ vā uddeso vā pamāṇaṃ,
atk-s0504a:330_4: hitamattassapi abhāvā sugatiyampi nibbattanakakāyikacetasikadukkhāya uppajjatīti sambandho.
atk-s0504a:330_15: Nibbānasampāpakamaggato hi uttariṃ hitaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0504a:330_17: Ye hi ariyasukhato viraddhā taṃ adhigantuṃ abhabbā,
atk-s0504a:330_19: ariyasukhato ca uttariṃ sukhaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0504a:330_20: Vuttañhetaṃ “ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho ceva āyatiñca sukhavipāko”ti.
atk-s0504a:331_0: Idāni “saṅghabhedo”ti sarūpato dassetvā tassa ahitādīnaṃ ekantahetubhāvaṃ pakāsetuṃ “saṅghe kho pana,
atk-s0504a:331_3: Tattha bhinneti nimittatthe bhummaṃ yathā “adhanānaṃ dhane ananuppadīyamāne”ti,
atk-s0504a:331_5: Aññamaññaṃ bhaṇḍanānīti catunnaṃ parisānaṃ tappakkhikānañca “eso dhammo,
atk-s0504a:331_8: Paribhāsāti “idañcidañca vo anatthaṃ karissāmā”ti bhayuppādanavasena tajjanā.
atk-s0504a:331_15: Na pasīdantīti “dhammacārino samacārino”tiādinā yvāyaṃ bhikkhūsu pasādanākāro,
atk-s0504a:331_17: tesaṃ vā sotabbaṃ saddhātabbaṃ na maññanti.
atk-s0504a:331_18: Tathā ca dhamme satthari ca appasannāva honti.
atk-s0504a:332_2: Ekaṃ antarakappaṃ paripuṇṇameva katvā tattha tiṭṭhatīti kappaṭṭho.
atk-s0504a:332_5: Bhedakaravatthūhi saṅghabhedasaṅkhāte eva ca adhamme ṭhitoti adhammaṭṭho.
atk-s0504a:332_6: Yogakkhemā padhaṃsatīti yogakkhemato hitato padhaṃsati parihāyati,
atk-s0504a:332_7: catūhi vā yogehi anupaddutattā yogakkhemaṃ nāma arahattaṃ nibbānañca,
atk-s0504a:335_3: nāyaṃ dhammo”tiādinā sace saṅghe vivādo uppajjeyya,
atk-s0504a:335_4: tattha dhammakāmena viññunā iti paṭisañcikkhitabbaṃ “ṭhānaṃ kho,
atk-s0504a:335_6: yadidaṃ vivādo vaḍḍhamāno saṅgharājiyā vā saṅghabhedāya vā saṃvatteyyā”ti.
atk-s0504a:335_7: Sace taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ attanā paggahetvā ṭhito,
atk-s0504a:335_8: aggiṃ akkantena viya sahasā tato oramitabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:335_9: Atha parehi taṃ paggahitaṃ sayañcetaṃ sakkoti vūpasametuṃ,

atk-s0504a:398_7: Dukkhassantakaro hotīti vaṭṭadukkhassa antakaro pariyosānakaro hoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0504a:398_8: Sabbasaṃyojanakkhayā anupubbena aggamaggaṃ adhigantvā niravasesānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ khepanāti arahattaphaleneva desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0504a:401_4: Te hatalābhasakkārā nippabhā nittejā issāpakatā ciñcamāṇavikaṃ nāma paribbājikaṃ uyyojesuṃ – “ehi,
atk-s0504a:401_7: Sā bhagavantaṃ catuparisamajjhe dhammaṃ desentaṃ upagantvā abhūtena abbhācikkhitvā sakkenassā abhūtabhāve
atk-s0504a:401_8: pakāsite mahājanena “dhī kāḷakaṇṇī”ti vihārato nikkaḍḍhāpitā pathaviyā vivare dinne avīcijālānaṃ indhanaṃ
atk-s0504a:401_12: ciñcamāṇavikā evaṃ uḷāraguṇaṃ aggadakkhiṇeyyaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ abhūtena akkositvā mahāvināsaṃ pattā”ti.
atk-s0504a:401_15: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0504a:401_17: pubbepi sā maṃ abhūtena akkositvā mahāvināsaṃ pattāyevā”ti mahāpadumajātakampi vitthāretvā upari dhammaṃ
atk-s0504a:401_18: desento imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā “ekadhammaṃ atītassā”ti idaṃ suttaṃ desesi.
atk-s0504a:402_1: Atītassāti yā sā aṭṭha anariyavohāre vajjetvā aṭṭhasu ariyavohāresu patiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ “saccaṃ, bhaṇe,
atk-s0504a:402_6: Sampajānamusāvādī hi puggalo kiñci pāpakammaṃ katvā “idaṃ nāma tayā kata”nti vutte “na mayā kata”nti musāvādeneva pariharissati.
atk-s0504a:403_0: Gāthāyaṃ musāvādissāti musā abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ paresaṃ viññāpanavasena vadanasīlassa.
atk-s0504a:403_1: Yassa dasasu vacanesu ekampi saccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0504a:403_6: Īdiso hi manussasampatti devalokasampatti avasāne nibbānasampattīti imā tissopi sampattiyo na passati.
atk-s0504a:403_7: Natthi pāpanti tassa tādisassa idaṃ nāma pāpaṃ na kattabbanti natthīti.
atk-s0504a:406_1: Chaṭṭhe evañceti ettha evanti upamākāre nipāto,
atk-s0504a:406_5: Dānasaṃvibhāgassāti yāya hi cetanāya annādideyyadhammaṃ saṃharitvā anukampāpūjāsu aññataravasena paresaṃ dīyati,
atk-s0504a:406_7: Yāya pana attanā paribhuñjitabbabhāvena gahitavatthussa ekadeso saṃvibhajitvā dīyati,
atk-s0504a:406_12: tiracchānagatassapi dānaṃ datvā attabhāvasate pavattasukhavipaccanavasena sataguṇā dakkhiṇā hotīti evamādinā,
atk-s0504a:406_14: yena pakārena ahaṃ dānassa saṃvibhāgassa ca vipākaṃ kammavipākaṃ ñāṇabalena paccakkhato jānāmi,
atk-s0504a:406_16: Na adatvā bhuñjeyyunti yaṃ bhuñjitabbayuttakaṃ attano atthi,
atk-s0504a:406_17: tato paresaṃ na adatvā macchariyacittena ca taṇhālobhavasena ca bhuñjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0504a:406_19: Na ca nesaṃ maccheramalaṃ cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭheyyāti attano sampattīnaṃ parehi sādhāraṇabhāvāsahanalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:406_20: cittassa pabhassarabhāvadūsakānaṃ upakkilesabhūtānaṃ kaṇhadhammānaṃ aññataraṃ maccheramalaṃ.
atk-s0504a:406_21: Atha vā yathāvuttamaccherañceva aññampi dānantarāyakaraṃ issālobhadosādimalañca nesaṃ sattānaṃ cittaṃ yathā dānacetanā na pavattati,
atk-s0504a:406_23: evaṃ pariyādāya parito gahetvā abhibhavitvā na tiṭṭheyya.
atk-s0504a:406_24: Ko hi sammadeva dānaphalaṃ jānanto attano citte maccheramalassa okāsaṃ dadeyya.
atk-s0504a:407_0: Yopi nesaṃ assa carimo ālopoti nesaṃ sattānaṃ yo sabbapacchimako ālopo siyā.
atk-s0504a:407_3: ime sattā pakatiyā yattakehi ālopehi sayaṃ yāpeyyuṃ,
atk-s0504a:407_4: tesu ekameva ālopaṃ attano atthāya ṭhapetvā tadaññe sabbe ālope āgatāgatānaṃ atthikānaṃ datvā yo ṭhapito ālopo assa,
atk-s0504a:407_7: sace nesaṃ paṭiggāhakā assūti nesaṃ sattānaṃ paṭiggāhakā yadi siyuṃ,
atk-s0504a:407_8: tatopi yathāvuttacarimālopatopi saṃvibhajitvāva ekadesaṃ datvāva bhuñjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0504a:407_11: Yasmā ca khotiādinā kammaphalassa appaccakkhabhāvato evamete sattā dānasaṃvibhāgesu na pavattantīti yathādhippetamatthaṃ kāraṇena sampaṭipādeti.
atk-s0504a:407_12: Eteneva tesaṃ tadaññapuññesu ca appaṭipattiyā apuññesu ca paṭipattiyā kāraṇaṃ dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:408_0: Gāthāsu yathāvuttaṃ mahesināti mahesinā bhagavatā “tiracchānagate dānaṃ datvā sataguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā’ tiādinā,
atk-s0504a:408_1: idheva vā “evaṃ ce sattā jāneyyu”ntiādinā yathāvuttaṃ,
atk-s0504a:408_2: ñāṇacārena taṃ yathāvuttaṃ cittaṃ ñātanti attho.
atk-s0504a:408_5: Yathā hoti mahapphalanti yathā so vipāko mahantaṃ phalaṃ hoti,
atk-s0504a:408_6: evaṃ ime sattā yadi jāneyyunti sambandho.
atk-s0504a:408_7: Vineyya maccheramalanti macchariyamalaṃ apanetvā kammaphalasaddhāya ratanattayasaddhāya ca visesato pasannena
atk-s0504a:408_8: cittena yesu kilesehi ārakattā ariyesu sīlādiguṇasampannesu dinnaṃ appakampi dānaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti,
atk-s0504a:409_3: Dakkhiṇaṃ paralokaṃ saddahitvā dātabbaṃ deyyadhammaṃ yathā taṃ dānaṃ hoti mahādānaṃ,
atk-s0504a:409_6: kathaṃ pana annaṃ dātabbanti āha “dakkhiṇeyyesu dakkhiṇa”nti.
atk-s0504a:409_7: Ito manussattā manussattabhāvato cutā paṭisandhivasena saggaṃ gacchanti dāyakā.
atk-s0504a:409_8: Kāmakāminoti kāmetabbānaṃ uḷārānaṃ devabhogānaṃ paṭiladdharūpavibhavena kammunā upagamane sādhukāritāya kāmakāmino sabbakāmasamaṅgino.
atk-s0504a:412_0: 27. Sattame yāni kānicīti anavasesapariyādānaṃ. Opadhikāni puññakiriyavatthūnīti
atk-s0504a:413_5: Puññakiriyavatthūnīti puññakiriyā ca tā tesaṃ tesaṃ phalānisaṃsānaṃ vatthūni cāti puññakiriyavatthūni.
atk-s0504a:413_14: Tañhi nīvaraṇādipaccanīkadhammato cittassa suṭṭhu vimuttibhāvena cetovimuttīti vuccati.
atk-s0504a:413_15: Kalaṃ nāgghanti soḷasinti mettābrahmavihārassa soḷasabhāgaṃ opadhikāni puññakiriyavatthūni na agghanti.
atk-s0504a:413_18: taṃ soḷasa koṭṭhāse katvā tato ekaṃ puna soḷasa koṭṭhāse katvā tattha yo ekakoṭṭhāso,
atk-s0504a:413_19: na taṃ aññāni opadhikāni puññakiriyavatthūni agghantīti.
atk-s0504a:413_22: Tapateti tato eva anavasese paṭipakkhadhamme santapati.
atk-s0504a:413_24: Mettā hi cetovimutti candālokasaṅkhātā vigatūpakkilesā juṇhā viya dippati,
atk-s0504a:413_25: ātapo viya andhakāraṃ paccanīkadhamme vidhamantī tapati,
atk-s0504a:414_17: osadhīnaṃ vā anubalappadāyikattā osadhīti laddhanāmā tārakā.
atk-s0504a:415_1: kasmā pana bhagavatā samānepi opadhikabhāve mettā itarehi opadhikapuññehi visesetvā vuttāti? Vuccate –
atk-s0504a:415_6: evaṃ etehi samannāgatā yogino brahmasamāva hutvā viharanti.
atk-s0504a:415_8: Iti seṭṭhaṭṭhena niddosabhāvena ca sattesu suppaṭipattibhāvato mettāva itarehi opadhikapuññehi visesetvā vuttā.
atk-s0504a:416_0: Evampi kasmā mettāva evaṃ visesetvā vuttā?
atk-s0504a:416_1: Itaresaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato dānādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ kalyāṇadhammānaṃ paripūrikattā ca.
atk-s0504a:416_6: atha sukheneva karuṇādibhāvanā sampajjantīti mettā itaresaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0504a:416_7: Tathā hi sattesu hitajjhāsayatāya sati nesaṃ dukkhāsahanatā,
atk-s0504a:416_9: pakkhapātābhāvena sabbattha samappavattacittatā ca sukheneva ijjhanti.
atk-s0504a:416_11: imassa na dātabba”nti uttamavicayavasena vibhāgaṃ akatvā sabbasattānaṃ niravasesasukhanidānaṃ dānaṃ denti,
atk-s0504a:416_16: uttamavīriyavasena vīrabhāvaṃ pattāpi sattānaṃ nānappakāraṃ hitajjhāsayeneva aparādhaṃ khamanti,
atk-s0504a:416_20: Tesu acalāya mettāya pubbakārino hitajjhāsayeneva nesaṃ vippakāre udāsīnā honti,
atk-s0504a:416_22: Evaṃ te pāramiyo pūretvā yāva dasabalacatu-
atk-s0504a:416_26: Evaṃ dānādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ kalyāṇadhammānaṃ pāripūrikā mettāti ca imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ sā itarehi visesetvā vuttā.
atk-s0504a:417_0: Apica mettāya itarehi opadhikapuññehi mahānubhāvatā velāmasuttena dīpetabbā.
atk-s0504a:417_1: Tattha hi yathā nāma mahatā velāmassa dānato ekassa sotāpannassa dānaṃ mahapphalataraṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0504a:417_8: tatopi gaddūhanamattaṃ kālaṃ mettābhāvanā mahapphalatarā vuttā. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:418_0: “Yaṃ gahapati velāmo brāhmaṇo dānaṃ adāsi mahādānaṃ.
atk-s0504a:418_5: Yo ca antamaso gaddūhanamattampi mettacittaṃ bhāveyya,
atk-s0504a:419_0: Mahaggatapuññabhāvena panassā parittapuññato sātisayatāya vattabbameva natthi.
atk-s0504a:419_5: mahaggatakammaṃ pana pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā odhisakānodhisakapharaṇavasena vaḍḍhitvā katattā appamāṇakataṃ nāma.
atk-s0504a:419_6: Kāmāvacarakammaṃ tassa mahaggatakammassa antarā laggituṃ vā taṃ kammaṃ abhibhavitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ gahetvā ṭhātuṃ vā na sakkoti,
atk-s0504a:419_7: atha kho mahaggatakammameva taṃ parittakammaṃ mahogho viya parittaṃ udakaṃ abhibhavitvā attano okāsaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0504a:419_8: tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā sayameva brahmasahabyataṃ upanetīti ayañhi tassa atthoti.
atk-s0504a:420_0: Gāthāsu yoti yo koci gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā.
atk-s0504a:420_3: Asubhabhāvanādayo viya hi ārammaṇe ekadesaggahaṇaṃ akatvā anavasesapharaṇavasena anodhisopharaṇavasena
atk-s0504a:420_5: Tanū saṃyojanā hontīti mettājhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā sammasitvā heṭṭhime ariyamagge adhigacchantassa sukheneva paṭighasaṃyojanādayo pahīyamānā tanū honti.
atk-s0504a:420_9: Atha vā tanū saṃyojanā hontīti mettājhānapadaṭṭhānāya vipassanāya anukkamena upadhikkhayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ
atk-s0504a:420_10: patvā taṃ passato pageva dasapi saṃyojanā tanū honti,
atk-s0504a:420_12: Atha vā tanū saṃyojanā hontīti paṭigho ceva paṭighasampayuttasaṃyojanā ca tanukā honti.
atk-s0504a:420_13: Passato upadhikkhayanti tesaṃyeva kilesūpadhīnaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ mettaṃ adhigamavasena passanta ssāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0504a:421_0: Evaṃ kilesappahānaṃ nibbānādhigamañca mettābhāvanāya sikhāppattamānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā idāni aññe ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “ekampi ce”tiādimāha.
atk-s0504a:421_1: Tattha aduṭṭhacittoti mettābalena suṭṭhu vikkhambhitabyāpādatāya byāpādena adūsitacitto.
atk-s0504a:421_10: sabbe pana pāṇe attano piyaputtaṃ viya hitapharaṇena manasā anukampanto pahūtaṃ bahuṃ anappakaṃ apariyantaṃ
atk-s0504a:421_11: catusaṭṭhimahākappepi attano vipākappabandhaṃ pavattetuṃ samatthaṃ uḷārapuññaṃ ariyo parisuddhacitto
atk-s0504a:423_10: Daliddamanussānaṃ potthake lekhaṃ gahetvā tīṇi vassāni vinā vaḍḍhiyā sahassadvisahassamattadhanānuppadānaṃ sammāpāsaṃ nāma.
atk-s0504a:423_11: Tañhi sammā manusse pāseti hadaye bandhitvā viya ṭhapeti,
atk-s0504a:423_13: “Tāta mātulā”tiādinā pana saṇhavācāya saṅgahaṇaṃ vācāpeyyaṃ nāma,
atk-s0504a:423_15: Evaṃ catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi saṅgahitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ iddhañceva hoti phītañca pahūtaannapānaṃ khemaṃ nirabbudaṃ.
atk-s0504a:423_16: Manussā mudā modamānā ure putte naccentā apārutagharā viharanti.
atk-s0504a:424_0: Aparabhāge pana okkākarājakāle brāhmaṇā imāni cattāri saṅgahavatthūni imañca raṭṭhasampattiṃ parivattentā
atk-s0504a:424_1: uddhammūlaṃ katvā assamedhaṃ purisamedhantiādike pañca yaññe nāma akaṃsu.
atk-s0504a:427_1: Dvīhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa ekavīsatiyūpassa ekasmiṃ pacchimadivase eva sattanavutipañcapasusataghātabhīsanassa
atk-s0504a:427_2: ṭhapetvā bhūmiñca purise ca avasesasabbavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:427_4: Catūhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃbhūmiyā assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:427_6: Yugacchiggaḷe pavesanadaṇḍakasaṅkhātaṃ sammaṃ khipitvā tassa patitokāse vediṃ katvā saṃhārimehi yūpādīhi
atk-s0504a:427_7: sarassatinadiyā nimuggokāsato pabhuti paṭilomaṃ gacchantena yajitabbassa satrayāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ
atk-s0504a:427_9: Ekena pariyaññena sattarasahi pasūhi yajitabbassa beḷuvayūpassa sattarasakadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:427_11: Navahi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃ bhūmiyā purisehi ca assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa sabbamedhapariyāyanāmassa
atk-s0504a:428_1: Tāragaṇāva sabbeti yathā sabbepi tārāgaṇā candimasobhāya soḷasimpi kalaṃ nāgghanti,
atk-s0504a:428_2: evaṃ te assamedhādayo yaññā mettacittassa vuttalakkhaṇena subhāvitassa soḷasimpi kalaṃ nānubhavanti,
atk-s0504a:429_0: Idāni aparepi diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyike mettābhāvanāya ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “yo na hantī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:429_2: Na hantīti teneva mettābhāvanānubhāvena dūravikkhambhitabyāpādatāya na kañci sattaṃ hiṃsati,
atk-s0504a:429_4: Na ghātetīti paraṃ samādapetvā na satte hanāpeti na vibādhāpeti ca.
atk-s0504a:429_5: Na jinātīti sārambhaviggāhikakathādivasena na kañci jināti sārambhasseva abhāvato,
atk-s0504a:429_6: jānikaraṇavasena vā aḍḍakaraṇādinā na kañci jināti.
atk-s0504a:429_7: Na jāpayeti parepi payojetvā paresaṃ dhanajāniṃ na kārāpeyya.
atk-s0504a:429_9: mettāya vā aṃso avijahanaṭṭhena avayavabhūtoti mettaṃso.
atk-s0504a:429_11: Tato eva veraṃ tassa na kenacīti akusalaveraṃ tassa kenacipi kāraṇena natthi,
atk-s0504a:429_12: puggalaverasaṅkhāto virodho kenaci purisena saddhiṃ tassa mettāvihārissa natthīti.
atk-s0504a:430_0: Evametasmiṃ ekakanipāte paṭipāṭiyā terasasu suttesu sikkhāsuttadvaye cāti pannarasasu suttesu vivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0504a:430_1: nīvaraṇasuttaṃ saṃyojanasuttaṃ appamādasuttaṃ aṭṭhisañcayasuttanti etesu catūsu suttesu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0504a:438_6: Dukkhaṃ viharatīti catūsupi iriyāpathesu kilesadukkhena ceva kāyikacetasikadukkhena ca dukkhaṃ viharati.
atk-s0504a:438_7: Savighātanti cittūpaghātena ceva kāyūpaghātena ca savighātaṃ.
atk-s0504a:438_8: Saupāyāsanti kilesūpāyāsena ceva sarīrakhedena ca balavaāyāsavasena saupāyāsaṃ.
atk-s0504a:438_9: Sapariḷāhanti kilesapariḷāhena ceva kāyapariḷāhena ca sapariḷāhaṃ.
atk-s0504a:438_14: Duggati pāṭikaṅkhāti duggatisaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ apāyānaṃ aññatarā gati icchitabbā,
atk-s0504a:439_3: Paṭiggahaṇaparibhogavasena bhojane mattaṃ na jānātīti bhojane amattaññū.
atk-s0504a:440_2: Kiñcāpi hi cakkhundriye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā natthi.
atk-s0504a:440_3: Na hi cakkhupasādaṃ nissāya sati vā muṭṭhassaccaṃ vā uppajjati.
atk-s0504a:440_4: Apica yadā rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0504a:440_5: tadā bhavaṅge dvikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe kiriyāmanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
atk-s0504a:440_9: tato kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
atk-s0504a:440_12: na āvajjanādīnaṃ aññatarasamaye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā atthi,
atk-s0504a:440_13: javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṃ vā muṭṭhassaccaṃ vā aññāṇaṃ vā akkhanti vā kosajjaṃ vā uppajjati,
atk-s0504a:440_15: Evaṃ hontopi so “cakkhudvāre asaṃvaro”ti vuccati. Kasmā?
atk-s0504a:440_16: Yasmā tasmiṃ sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni vīthicittānipi.
atk-s0504a:440_18: Yathā nagare catūsu dvāresu asaṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharadvārakoṭṭhakagabbhādayo susaṃvutā tathāpi antonagare
atk-s0504a:440_22: Evameva javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ asaṃvare satidvārampi aguttaṃ hoti,

atk-s0504a:445_12: paribhuñjatī”ti ca ādinā nayena vuttassa paccavekkhitvā paṭisaṅkhānapaññāya jānitvā āhāraparibhuñjanasaṅkhātassa

atk-s0504a:448_3: Tattha yvāyaṃ akkhikūpake patiṭṭhito heṭṭhā akkhikūpakaṭṭhikena,

atk-s0504a:448_10: Vitthārato catasso dhātuyo taṃnissitā vaṇṇagandharasaojāsaṇṭhānasambhavāti imāni dasa catusamuṭṭhānikattā cattālīsaṃ honti,

atk-s0504a:448_12: Yaṃ loke “setaṃ vaṭṭaṃ puthulaṃ visaṭaṃ vipulaṃ cakkhū”ti sañjānanto na cakkhuṃ sañjānāti,

atk-s0504a:448_24: Yo pana ettha sito ettha paṭibaddho catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo,
atk-s0504a:449_2: Ettha “dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya ubho sadde suṇātī”ti idaṃ dibbasotaṃ nāma.
atk-s0504a:449_3: Maṃsasotaṃ pana sasambhārasotaṃ pasādasotanti duvidhantiādi sabbaṃ cakkhumhi vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ,

atk-s0504a:451_12: Manoti pana kiñcāpi sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ vuccati,

atk-s0504a:452_2: adhigacchatīti so bhikkhu vuttanayena bhojane amattaññū indriyesu ca saṃvararahito diṭṭhadhammikañca rogādivasena,

atk-s0504a:452_7: vā rattiṃ niccakālameva tādiso puggalo dukkhameva viharati,
atk-s0504a:458_1: Tatiye tapanīyāti idha ceva samparāye ca tapanti vibādhenti viheṭhentīti tapanīyā.
atk-s0504a:458_2: Tapanaṃ vā dukkhaṃ diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāye ca tassa uppādanena ceva anubalappadānena ca hitāti tapanīyā.
atk-s0504a:458_7: Akatakalyāṇoti akataṃ kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ puññaṃ etenāti akatakalyāṇo.
atk-s0504a:458_9: Puññañhi pavattihitatāya āyatiṃsukhatāya ca bhaddakaṭṭhena kalyāṇanti ca kucchitasalanādiatthena kusalanti
atk-s0504a:458_10: ca dukkhabhīrūnaṃ saṃsārabhīrūnañca rakkhanaṭṭhena bhīruttāṇanti ca vuccati.
atk-s0504a:458_11: Katapāpoti kataṃ upacitaṃ pāpaṃ etenāti katapāpo.
atk-s0504a:458_13: Akusalakammañhi lāmakaṭṭhena pāpanti ca attano pavattikkhaṇe vipākakkhaṇe ca ghorasabhāvatāya luddanti
atk-s0504a:458_14: ca kilesehi dūsitabhāvena kibbisanti ca vuccati.
atk-s0504a:458_15: Iti bhagavā “dve dhammā tapanīyā”ti dhammādhiṭṭhānena uddisitvā akataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ katañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānena niddisi.
atk-s0504a:458_16: Idāni tesaṃ tapanīyabhāvaṃ dassento “so akataṃ me kalyāṇantipi tappati,
atk-s0504a:459_5: Imāni ca kāyaduccaritādīni kammapathappattāni adhippetānīti yaṃ na kammapathappattaṃ akusalajātaṃ,
atk-s0504a:459_8: yampi ca aññaṃ kammapathabhāvaṃ appattattā nippariyāyena kāyakammādisaṅkhaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0504a:459_9: rāgādikilesasaṃsaṭṭhattā dosasahitaṃ akusalaṃ tampi katvāti attho.
atk-s0504a:459_10: Nirayanti niratiatthena nirassādaṭṭhena vā nirayanti laddhanāmaṃ sabbampi duggatiṃ,
atk-s0504a:459_12: So tādiso puggalo upagacchatīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0504a:460_0: Ettha ca kāyaduccaritassa tapanīyabhāve nando yakkho nando māṇavako nando goghātako dve bhātikāti etesaṃ vatthūni kathetabbāni.
atk-s0504a:460_1: Te kira gāviṃ vadhitvā maṃsaṃ dve koṭṭhāse akaṃsu.
atk-s0504a:460_8: Nivattitvā ca naṃ olokento mataṃ disvā “bhāriyaṃ vata mayā kataṃ,

atk-s0504a:460_11: So ṭhitaṭṭhānepi nisinnaṭṭhānepi tadeva kammaṃ āvajjeti,
atk-s0504a:460_18: udāhu atthi kiñci tapanīyaṃ kammaṃ kata”nti? So “āma,
atk-s0504a:460_23: So teneva kammunā kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatti.
atk-s0504a:466_1: Pañcame pāpakena ca sīlenāti pāpakaṃ nāma sīlaṃ sīlabhedakaro asaṃvaroti vadanti.
atk-s0504a:466_12: pāpako ājīvo”ti vacanato akusaladhammesupi attheva sīlasamaññā,
atk-s0504a:466_13: tasmā paricayavasena sabhāvasiddhi viya pakatibhūto sabbo samācāro “sīla”nti vuccati.
atk-s0504a:466_16: Pāpikāya ca diṭṭhiyāti sabbāpi micchādiṭṭhiyo pāpikāva.
atk-s0504a:466_20: Tattha pāpakena sīlena samannāgato puggalo payogavipanno hoti,
atk-s0504a:466_25: dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo yathābhataṃ nikkhitto,
atk-s0504a:466_27: Ettha ca “dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato”ti idaṃ lakkhaṇavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-s0504a:469_4: Bhaddikāya ca diṭṭhiyāti kammassakatāñāṇena ceva kammapathasammādiṭṭhiyā ca.

atk-s0504a:472_1: Sattame anātāpīti kilesānaṃ ātāpanaṭṭhena ātāpo, vīriyaṃ,
atk-s0504a:472_12: na ottapati pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0504a:472_14: So assa atthīti anottāpīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:473_5: catūhi yogehi anupaddutattā khemaṃ nibbhayanti yogakkhemanti ca vuccati.
atk-s0504a:473_8: So hi “āraddhavīriyo viharati akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya,
atk-s0504a:473_10: thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesū”ti evaṃ vuttena vīriyārambhena samannāgato kilesānaṃ accantameva ātāpanasīloti ātāpī.
atk-s0504a:473_12: ottapati pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā”ti evaṃ vuttena ottappena samannāgatattā ottapanasīloti ottappī.
atk-s0504a:473_14: Tadavinābhāvato hiriyā ca samannāgato eva hotīti hirottappasampanno aṇumattepi vajje bhayadassāvī sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti.
atk-s0504a:473_16: Ātāpīti iminā nayenassa kilesaparitāpitādīpanena samathavipassanābhāvanānuyuttatā dassitā.
atk-s0504a:473_17: Yathāvuttañca vīriyaṃ saddhāsatisamādhipaññāhi vinā na hotīti vimuttiparipācakāni saddhāpañcamāni indriyāni atthato vuttāneva honti.
atk-s0504a:473_23: nirodhasaññāti cha nibbedhabhāgiyā saññā siddhā evāti.
atk-s0504a:473_24: Evaṃ imehi dvīhi dhammehi samannāgatassa lokiyānaṃ sīlasamādhipaññānaṃ sijjhanato maggaphalanibbānādhigamassa bhabbataṃ dassento “ātāpī ca kho…pe…
atk-s0504a:474_0: Gāthāsu kusītoti micchāvitakkabahulatāya kāmabyāpādavihiṃsāvitakkasaṅkhātehi kucchitehi pāpadhammehi sito sambandho yuttoti kusīto.

atk-s0504a:474_7: asattivighātasabhāvassa kāyālasiyassa middhassa ca abhiṇhappavattiyā thinamiddhabahulo.

atk-s0504a:475_1: Nipakoti sattaṭṭhāniyasampajaññasaṅkhātena ceva kammaṭṭhānapariharaṇapaññāsaṅkhātena ca nepakkena samannāgatattā nipako.
atk-s0504a:475_2: Jhāyīti ārammaṇūpanijjhānena lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena cāti dvīhipi jhānehi jhāyī.
atk-s0504a:475_3: Appamattoti “divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇiyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetī”tiādinā nayena kammaṭṭhānabhāvanāya appamatto.
atk-s0504a:475_4: Saṃyojanaṃ jātijarāya chetvāti jātiyā ceva jarāya ca satte saṃyojetīti saṃyojananti laddhanāmaṃ kāmarāgādikaṃ
atk-s0504a:475_6: Atha vā saṃyojanaṃ jātijarāya chetvāti jātijarāya saṃyojanaṃ chinditvā.
atk-s0504a:475_11: Tasmā saṃyojanaṃ chindanto eva jātijarāpi chindati.
atk-s0504a:475_13: Idheva sambodhimanuttaraṃ phuseti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve aggamaggaṃ arahattaṃ vā phuse pāpuṇeyya.
atk-s0504a:478_1: Aṭṭhame nayidanti ettha naiti paṭisedhe nipāto,

atk-s0504a:509_2: Janakuhanatthanti “aho ayyo sīlavā vattasampanno appiccho santuṭṭho mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo”tiādinā janassa sattalokassa vimhāpanatthaṃ.

atk-s0504a:509_13: Iti maṃ jano jānātūti “evaṃ brahmacariyavāse sati ‘ayaṃ sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo’tiādinā maṃ jano jānātu
