atk-s0504a:520_0: Nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ ogadhaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ pāraṃ gacchatīti nibbānogadhagāmī,
atk-s0504a:520_3: Soti yo so samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhinditvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
atk-s0504a:520_6: Tena vinā nibbānogāhanassa asambhavato tassa ca nibbānaṃ anālambitvā appavattanato,
atk-s0504a:520_8: Atha vā nibbānogadhagāminanti nibbānassa antogāminaṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ,
atk-s0504a:520_9: nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karitvā tassa anto eva vattati pavattatīti.
atk-s0504a:520_12: mahante vā sīlakkhandhādike esanti gavesantīti mahesino buddhādayo ariyā.
atk-s0504a:520_14: Yathā buddhena desitanti yathā abhiññeyyādidhamme abhiññeyyādibhāveneva sammāsambuddhena mayā desitaṃ,
atk-s0504a:520_15: evaṃ ye etaṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ tadatthaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyañca paṭipajjanti.
atk-s0504a:520_16: Te diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthehi yathārahaṃ anusāsantassa satthu mayhaṃ sāsanakārino ovādappaṭikarā
atk-s0504a:520_17: sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ pariyantaṃ appavattiṃ karissanti,
atk-s0504a:523_1: Navame abhiññatthanti kusalādivibhāgena khandhādivibhāgena ca sabbadhamme abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena aviparītato jānanatthaṃ.
atk-s0504a:523_5: pahānasacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamayehi pana vinā na pavattatīti pahānādayopi idha gahitāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:526_1: Dasame sukhasomanassabahuloti ettha sukhanti kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ,
atk-s0504a:526_3: Tasmā yassa kāyikaṃ cetasikañca sukhaṃ abhiṇhaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0504a:527_0: “Na cāhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūmi, yonijaṃ mattisambhava”nti ca. ;
atk-s0504a:528_0: “Tamenaṃ kammajā vātā nibbattitvā uddhaṃpādaṃ adhosiraṃ samparivattetvā mātu yonimukhe sampaṭipādentī”ti ca ādīsu passāvamaggo.
atk-s0504a:528_3: Āraddhāti paṭṭhapitā paggahitā paripuṇṇā sampāditā vā.
atk-s0504a:529_4: okāsato yāva bhavaggā savantīti vā āsavā.
atk-s0504a:529_5: Ete dhamme etañca okāsaṃ anto karitvā pavattantīti attho.
atk-s0504a:529_8: Loke hi cirapārivāsikā madirādayo āsavāti vuccanti.
atk-s0504a:529_16: Purimāni cettha nibbacanāni yattha kilesā āsavāti āgatā,
atk-s0504a:529_26: diṭṭhadhammikānaṃyeva āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desemī”ti ettha vivādamūlabhūtā kilesā āsavāti āgatā.
atk-s0504a:532_0: Te mayhaṃ, āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. –
atk-s0504a:533_0: Ettha tebhūmakaṃ kammaṃ avasesā ca akusalā dhammā.
atk-s0504a:533_1: “Diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti ettha parūpaghātavippaṭisāravadhabandhādayo
atk-s0504a:534_0: Te panete āsavā vinaye “diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya,
atk-s0504a:534_6: Abhidhamme teyeva diṭṭhāsavena saddhiṃ catudhā āgatā.
atk-s0504a:534_17: āsavā saṃvarā pahātabbā”tiādinā nayena chadhā āgatā.
atk-s0504a:534_18: Sabbāsavapariyāye teyeva dassanapahātabbehi dhammehi saddhiṃ sattadhā āgatā.
atk-s0504a:534_19: Idha pana abhidhammapariyāyena cattāro āsavā adhippetāti veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:535_0: Khayāyāti ettha pana “yo āsavānaṃ khayo vayo bhedo paribhedo aniccatā antaradhāna”nti āsavānaṃ sarasabhedo āsavānaṃ khayoti vutto.
atk-s0504a:535_3: passato āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmī”ti ettha āsavānaṃ khīṇākāro natthibhāvo accantaṃ asamuppādo āsavakkhayoti vutto.
atk-s0504a:537_0: Khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tato aññā anantarā”ti. –
atk-s0504a:538_0: Ettha ariyamaggo āsavakkhayoti vutto. “Āsavānaṃ khayā samaṇo hotī”ti ettha phalaṃ.
atk-s0504a:540_0: Āsavā tassa vaḍḍhanti, ārā so āsavakkhayā”ti. –
atk-s0504a:541_0: Ettha nibbānaṃ. Idha pana phalaṃ sandhāya “āsavānaṃ khayāyā”ti vuttaṃ, arahattaphalatthāyāti attho.
atk-s0504a:542_0: Saṃvejanīyesu ṭhānesūti saṃvegajanakesu jātiādīsu saṃvegavatthūsu. Jāti, jarā, byādhi, maraṇaṃ,
atk-s0504a:542_4: paccuppanne āhārapariyeṭṭhimūlakaṃ dukkhanti imāni hi saṃvegavatthūni saṃvejanīyaṭṭhānāni nāma.
atk-s0504a:542_10: ūno loko atitto taṇhādāso”tievamādīni cettha saṃvejanīyaṭṭhānānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0504a:543_4: So hi yathā akusalā dhammā pahīyanti,
atk-s0504a:543_7: Tattha saṃvegena bhavādīsu kiñci tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ apassanto tattha anolīyanto alaggamānaso tappaṭipakkhena
atk-s0504a:543_8: ca vinivattitavisaññito aññadatthu nibbānaninno hoti nibbānapoṇo nibbānapabbhāro.
atk-s0504a:543_9: So kalyāṇamittasannissayena yonisomanasikārabahulo visuddhāsayappayogo samathavipassanāsu yuttappayutto
atk-s0504a:543_12: Tattha yadidaṃ yonisomanasikārabahulo visuddhāsayappayogo samathavipassanāsu yuttappayutto,
atk-s0504a:543_14: Yaṃ panāyaṃ samathe patiṭṭhito vipassanāya yuttappayutto sabbasmimpi saṅkhāragate nibbindati virajjati,
atk-s0504a:543_16: tenassa yoni āraddhā āsavānaṃ khayāyāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:544_0: Gāthāsu saṃvijjethevāti saṃvijjeyya eva saṃvegaṃ kareyya eva.
atk-s0504a:544_5: Paññāya samavekkhiyāti saṃvegavatthūni saṃvijjanavasena paññāya sammā avekkhiya.
atk-s0504a:550_4: Tathā hesa “hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”tiādīsu sattavohāre.
atk-s0504a:559_2: Tasmā tathāgatanti ettha aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgatoti vuccati.
atk-s0504a:560_1: Yathā yena abhinīhārena dānapāramiṃ pūretvā sīlanekkhammapaññāvīriyakhantisaccaadhiṭṭhānamettāupekkhāpāramiṃ pūretvā imā dasa pāramiyo,
atk-s0504a:560_3: dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā aṅgapariccāgaṃ,
atk-s0504a:560_7: rajjapariccāganti imāni pañca mahāpariccāgāni pariccajitvā yathā vipassiādayo sammāsambuddhā āgatā,
atk-s0504a:560_8: tathā amhākaṃ bhagavāpi āgatoti tathāgato. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:566_1: Yathā sampatijātāva vipassiādayo samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya uttarābhimukhā sattapadavītihārena gatā,
atk-s0504a:566_2: tathā amhākaṃ bhagavāpi gatoti tathāgato. Yathāhu –
atk-s0504a:581_2: sadevamanussāya pajāya aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthamāgacchantaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0504a:581_4: Evaṃ jānatā passatā cānena taṃ iṭṭhādivasena vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu labbhamānapadavasena vā “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ,
atk-s0504a:581_5: yaṃ rūpaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ pītaka”ntiādinā nayena
atk-s0504a:581_6: anekehi nāmehi terasahi vārehi dvepaññāsāya nayehi vibhajjamānaṃ tathameva hoti,
atk-s0504a:582_3: sadevamanussāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā,
atk-s0504a:583_0: Evaṃ tathadassitāya tathāgato. Ettha tathadassiatthe tathāgatoti padassa sambhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:584_1: Yaṃ rattiṃ bhagavā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
atk-s0504a:584_3: etthantare pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇakāle yaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ suttageyyādi,
atk-s0504a:584_4: sabbaṃ taṃ parisuddhaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ rāgamadādinimmadanaṃ ekasadisaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ. Tenāha –
atk-s0504a:585_3: yaṃ etasmiṃ antare bhāsati lapati niddisati,
atk-s0504a:586_4: Tatho aviparīto āgado assāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti,
atk-s0504a:588_1: Yasmā bhagavā upari bhavaggaṃ heṭṭhā avīciṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu sabbasatte
atk-s0504a:588_2: abhibhavati sīlenapi samādhināpi paññāyapi vimuttiyāpi vimuttiñāṇadassanenapi,
atk-s0504a:588_3: na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi,
atk-s0504a:588_4: atha kho atulo appameyyo anuttaro devānaṃ atidevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā sabbasattuttamo,
atk-s0504a:589_2: manussāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthu daso vasavattī,
atk-s0504a:590_3: Tena hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko viya dibbāgadena sappe,
atk-s0504a:590_5: Iti sabbalokābhibhavane tatho aviparīto yathāvutto agado etassāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:591_2: Tattha sakalalokaṃ tīraṇapariññāya tathāya gato avagatoti tathāgato,
atk-s0504a:591_3: lokasamudayaṃ pahānapariññāya tathāya gato atītoti tathāgato,
atk-s0504a:591_4: lokanirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāya tathāya gato adhigatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:591_5: Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ tathaṃ gato paṭipannoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:594_0: Kathaṃ tathāya āgatoti tathāgato? Yā sā bhagavatā sumedhabhūtena dīpaṅkaradasabalassa pādamūle –
atk-s0504a:598_0: Evaṃ vuttaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ abhinīhāraṃ sampādentena “ahaṃ sadevakaṃ lokaṃ tiṇṇo tāressāmi,
atk-s0504a:607_0: Taṃ panetaṃ mahāpaṭiññaṃ sakalassapi buddhakaradhammasamudāyassa pavicayapaccavekkhaṇasamādānānaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ
atk-s0504a:607_1: avisaṃvādento lokanātho yasmā mahākappānaṃ satasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ
atk-s0504a:607_6: buddhicariyaṃ paramakoṭiṃ pāpetvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhi;
atk-s0504a:607_7: tasmā tasseva sā mahāpaṭiññā tathā avitathā anaññathā,
atk-s0504a:607_11: kassapo bhagavāti ime catuvīsati sammāsambuddhā paṭipāṭiyā uppannā “buddho bhavissatī”ti naṃ byākariṃsu.
atk-s0504a:607_12: Evaṃ catuvīsatiyā buddhānaṃ santike laddhabyākaraṇo ye te katābhinīhārehi bodhisattehi laddhabbā ānisaṃsā,
atk-s0504a:607_13: te labhitvāva āgatoti tāya yathāvuttāya mahāpaṭiññāya tathāya abhisambuddhabhāvaṃ āgato adhigatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:608_2: yāya mahādukkhasambādhappaṭipannaṃ sattanikāyaṃ disvā “tassa natthañño koci paṭisaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0504a:608_3: ahameva naṃ ito saṃsāradukkhato mutto mocessāmī”ti samussāhitamānaso mahābhinīhāraṃ akāsi.
atk-s0504a:608_4: Katvā ca yathāpaṇidhānaṃ sakalalokahitasampādanāya ussukkamāpanno attano kāyajīvitanirapekkho paresaṃ
atk-s0504a:608_5: sotapathagamanamattenapi cittutrāsasamuppādikā atidukkarā dukkaracariyā samācaranto yathā mahābodhisattānaṃ
atk-s0504a:608_6: paṭipatti hānabhāgiyā saṃkilesabhāgiyā ṭhitibhāgiyā vā na hoti,
atk-s0504a:608_8: tathā paṭipajjamāno anupubbena niravasese bodhisambhāre samānetvā abhisambodhiṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0504a:608_9: Tato parañca tāyeva mahākaruṇāya sañcoditamānaso pavivekaratiṃ paramañca santaṃ vimokkhasukhaṃ pahāya
atk-s0504a:608_10: bālajanabahule loke tehi samuppāditaṃ sammānāvamānavippakāraṃ agaṇetvā veneyyajanavinayanena niravasesaṃ
atk-s0504a:608_12: Tatra yo bhagavato sattesu mahākaruṇāya samokkamanākāro,
atk-s0504a:608_15: evaṃ bodhisattabhūtassapi mahābhinīhārakālādīsūti sabbattha sabbadā ca ekasadisatāya tathāva sā avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0504a:608_16: Tasmā tīsupi avatthāsu sabbasattesu samānarasāya tathāya mahākaruṇāya sakalalokahitāya gato paṭipannoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:609_5: ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti evaṃ sabbañeyyasaṅgāhakānaṃ pavattinivattitadubhayahetubhūtānaṃ catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ,
atk-s0504a:609_9: maggassa niyyānaṭṭho hetvaṭṭho dassanaṭṭho adhipateyyaṭṭhotiādīnaṃ tabbibhāgānañca yathābhūtasabhāvāvabodhavibandhakassa
atk-s0504a:609_10: saṃkilesapakkhassa samucchindanena paṭiladdhāya tattha asammohābhisamayasaṅkhātāya aviparītākārappavattiyā
atk-s0504a:609_11: dhammānaṃ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇassa avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni,
atk-s0504a:609_12: tāni bhagavā anaññaneyyo sayameva āgato adhigato,
atk-s0504a:610_1: evaṃ bhagavato tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇāni catupaṭisambhidāñāṇāni catuvesārajjañāṇāni pañcagatiparicchedañāṇāni
atk-s0504a:611_1: yañhi kiñci aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ hīnādibhedabhinnānaṃ hīnādibhedabhinnāsu atītāsu
atk-s0504a:611_2: khandhāyatanadhātūsu sabhāvakiccādi avatthāvisesādi khandhapaṭibaddhanāmagottādi ca jānitabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:611_3: Anindriyabaddhesu ca atisukhumatirohitavidūradesesu rūpadhammesu yo taṃtaṃpaccayavisesehi saddhiṃ paccayuppannānaṃ
atk-s0504a:611_5: tattha sabbattheva hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalako viya paccakkhato asaṅgamappaṭihataṃ bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0504a:611_6: tathā anāgatāsu paccuppannāsu cāti imāni tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇāni nāma. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:613_0: Tāni panetāni tattha tattha dhammānaṃ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇassa avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni,
atk-s0504a:614_4: Tattha atthapabhedassa sallakkhaṇavibhāvanavavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṃ atthe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā.
atk-s0504a:616_0: Ettha ca hetuanusārena araṇīyato adhigantabbato ca saṅkhepato hetuphalaṃ attho nāma.
atk-s0504a:616_4: Taṃ atthaṃ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ atthe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā.
atk-s0504a:616_6: So hi yasmā taṃ taṃ atthaṃ vidahati pavatteti ceva pāpeti ca,
atk-s0504a:616_8: Pabhedato pana yo koci phalanibbattako hetu,
atk-s0504a:616_11: taṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ dhamme pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā.
atk-s0504a:618_2: Ye dhammā jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā pātubhūtā,
atk-s0504a:618_4: Yamhā dhammā te dhammā jātā bhūtā sañjātā nibbattā abhinibbattā pātubhūtā,
atk-s0504a:618_9: jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā. Jātiyā, bhave, upādāne, taṇhāya, vedanāya, phasse,
atk-s0504a:619_3: So tassa tasseva bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānāti –
atk-s0504a:620_1: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe…
atk-s0504a:620_2: dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha,
atk-s0504a:621_0: Tasmiṃ atthe ca dhamme ca sabhāvanirutti abyabhicāravohāro abhilāpo,
atk-s0504a:621_1: tasmiṃ sabhāvaniruttābhilāpe māgadhikāya sabbasattānaṃ mūlabhāsāya “ayaṃ sabhāvanirutti,
atk-s0504a:621_2: ayaṃ na sabhāvaniruttī”ti pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā.
atk-s0504a:621_3: Yathāvuttesu tesu ñāṇesu gocarakiccādivasena vitthārato pavattaṃ sabbampi ñāṇamārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa
atk-s0504a:621_5: Iti imāni cattāri paṭisambhidāñāṇāni sayameva bhagavatā adhigatāni atthadhammādike tasmiṃ tasmiṃ attano
atk-s0504a:621_6: visaye avisaṃvādanavasena aviparītākārappavattiyā tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni.
atk-s0504a:622_1: sabbaṃ taṃ bhagavatā sabbākārena ñātaṃ diṭṭhaṃ adhigataṃ abhisambuddhaṃ.
atk-s0504a:622_2: Tathā hissa abhiññeyyā dhammā abhiññeyyato buddhā,
atk-s0504a:622_7: yato naṃ koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā “ime nāma te dhammā anabhisambuddhā”ti saha dhammena anuyuñjituṃ samattho natthi.
atk-s0504a:623_1: sabbaṃ taṃ bhagavatā anavasesato bodhimūleyeva pahīnaṃ anuppattidhammaṃ,
atk-s0504a:623_2: na tassa pahānāya uttari karaṇīyaṃ atthi.
atk-s0504a:623_10: kammapathaekavīsatianesanadvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigataaṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritādippabhedaṃ diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ saha vāsanāya pahīnaṃ samucchinnaṃ samūhataṃ,
atk-s0504a:623_12: brahmā vā “ime nāma te kilesā appahīnā”ti saha dhammena anuyuñjituṃ samattho natthi.
atk-s0504a:624_0: Ye cime bhagavatā kammavipākakilesūpavādaāṇāvītikkamappabhedā antarāyikā dhammā vuttā,
atk-s0504a:624_3: brahmā vā “nālaṃ te paṭisevato antarāyāyā”ti saha dhammena anuyuñjituṃ samattho natthi.
atk-s0504a:625_0: Yo ca bhagavatā niravasesavaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇāya sīlasamādhipaññāsaṅgaho sattakoṭṭhāsiko sattatiṃsappabhedo
atk-s0504a:625_4: brahmā vā “niyyānadhammo tayā desito na niyyātī”ti saha dhammena anuyuñjituṃ samattho natthi.
atk-s0504a:625_6: “sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0504a:625_7: Evametāni attano ñāṇappahānadesanāvisesānaṃ avitathabhāvāvabodhanato aviparītākārappavattāni bhagavato
atk-s0504a:626_6: lokantarikanirayo cāti sabbepime ekantadukkhatāya nirassādaṭṭhena nirayā ca,
atk-s0504a:626_8: Tibbandhakārasītanarakāpi etesveva antogadhā kimikīṭapaṭaṅgasarīsapapakkhisoṇasiṅgālādayo tiriyaṃ añchitabhāvena tiracchānā nāma.
atk-s0504a:626_13: Parittadīpavāsīhi saddhiṃ jambudīpādicatumahādīpavāsino manaso ussannatāya manussā,
atk-s0504a:626_15: Cātumahārājikato paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpagāti ime chabbīsati devanikāyā dibbanti attano iddhānubhāvena kīḷanti jotenti cāti devā,
atk-s0504a:627_0: Tā panetā gatiyo yasmā taṃtaṃkammanibbatto upapattibhavaviseso,
atk-s0504a:627_1: tasmā atthato vipākakkhandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ.
atk-s0504a:627_2: Tattha “ayaṃ nāma gati nāma iminā kammunā jāyati,
atk-s0504a:627_3: tassa kammassa paccayavisesehi evaṃ vibhāgabhinnattā visuṃ ete sattanikāyā evaṃ vibhāgabhinnā”ti yathāsakaṃhetuphalavibhāgaparicchindanavasena
atk-s0504a:628_9: yathā paṭipanno ca kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati,
atk-s0504a:629_0: Tāni panetāni bhagavato ñāṇāni tasmiṃ tasmiṃ visaye aviparītākārappavattiyā avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni.
atk-s0504a:631_27: na vipākāvaraṇena samannāgato”tiādinā ca sattānaṃ āsayādīnaṃ yathābhūtaṃ vibhāvanākārappavattaṃ bhagavato āsayānusayañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0504a:633_1: aṅgulaṅgulantarehi lomalomakūpehi ca aggikkhandhūdakadhārāpavattanaṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ vividhavikubbaniddhinimmāpanakaṃ
atk-s0504a:635_0: Yañca rāgādīhi jātiādīhi ca anekehi dukkhadhammehi upaddutaṃ sattanikāyaṃ tato nīharitukāmatāvasena nānānayehi
atk-s0504a:635_1: pavattassa bhagavato mahākaruṇokkamanassa paccayabhūtaṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattiñāṇaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:636_1: Bahukehi ākārehi passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati,
atk-s0504a:636_2: āditto lokasannivāsoti passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamatī”ti. –
atk-s0504a:638_2: tassa sabbassa paropadesena vinā sabbākārato paṭijānanasamatthaṃ ākaṅkhāmattappaṭibaddhavutti anaññasādhāraṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:638_4: tatthāvaraṇābhāvatova nissaṅgappavattiṃ upādāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti ca vuccati.
atk-s0504a:639_0: Evametāni bhagavato cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni aviparītākārappavattiyā yathāsakaṃvisayassa avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni.
atk-s0504a:640_9: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo”ti evaṃ sarūpato yāyaṃ lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānā līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhattakilamathānuyogaucchedasassatābhinivesādīnaṃ
atk-s0504a:640_17: Ariyasāvako vā yathāvuttāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā “bodhī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0504a:640_18: Tassa bodhissa aṅgāti bojjhaṅgāti evaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇato,
atk-s0504a:640_24: avikkhepalakkhaṇo samādhisambojjhaṅgo paṭisaṅkhānalakkhaṇo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgoti evaṃ visesalakkhaṇato.
atk-s0504a:641_1: Idha bhikkhu satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato,
atk-s0504a:641_2: cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā hoti anussaritā”tiādinā sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ aññamaññūpakāravasena ekakkhaṇe pavattidassanato.
atk-s0504a:641_5: atthi bahiddhā dhammesu satī”tiādinā tesaṃ visayavibhāvanāpavattidassanato.
atk-s0504a:641_13: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti…pe…
atk-s0504a:641_18: Yā sati anussatī”tiādinā chanavutiyā nayasahassavibhāgehīti evaṃ nānākārato pavattāni bhagavato bojjhaṅgavibhāvanañāṇāni
atk-s0504a:641_19: tassa tassa atthassa avisaṃvādanato tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni.
atk-s0504a:642_5: Sabbakilesehi ārakattā ariyabhāvakarattā ariyaphalapaṭilābhakarattā ca ariyo.
atk-s0504a:642_6: Ariyānaṃ aṭṭhavidhattā nibbānādhigamāya ekantakāraṇattā ca aṭṭhaṅgiko.
atk-s0504a:642_9: sayaṃ vā nibbānaṃ maggayatīti maggoti evaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇato.
atk-s0504a:642_18: Sammādiṭṭhi tāva aññehipi attano paccanīkakilesehi saddhiṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ pajahati,
atk-s0504a:642_24: Sammādiṭṭhi pubbabhāge nānakkhaṇā visuṃ dukkhādiārammaṇā hutvā maggakāle ekakkhaṇā nibbānameva ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0504a:642_25: katvā kiccato “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādīni cattāri nāmāni labhati.
atk-s0504a:642_28: tesu sammāsaṅkappo kiccato “nekkhammasaṅkappo”tiādīni tīṇi nāmāni labhati.
atk-s0504a:642_29: Sammāvācādayo tayo pubbabhāge “musāvādā veramaṇī”tiādivibhāgā viratiyopi cetanāyopi hutvā maggakkhaṇe viratiyova,
atk-s0504a:642_30: sammāvāyāmasatiyo kiccato sammappadhānasatipaṭṭhānavasena cattāri nāmāni labhanti.
atk-s0504a:642_31: Sammāsamādhi pana maggakkhaṇepi paṭhamajjhānādivasena nānā evāti evaṃ pubbabhāgāparabhāgesu pavattivibhāgato. “Idha,
atk-s0504a:642_38: sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo”tiādinā caturāsītiyā nayasahassavibhāgehīti evaṃ anekākārato pavattāni bhagavato
atk-s0504a:642_39: ariyamaggavibhāvanañāṇāni atthassa avisaṃvādanato sabbānipi tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni evampi bhagavā
atk-s0504a:643_0: Tathā paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiyā ca nirodhasamāpattīti etāsu anupaṭipāṭiyā viharitabbaṭṭhena samāpajjitabbaṭṭhena
atk-s0504a:643_1: ca anupubbavihārasamāpattīsu sampādanapaccavekkhaṇādivasena yathārahaṃ sampayogavasena ca pavattāni bhagavato
atk-s0504a:643_5: idaṃ aṭṭhāna”nti aviparītaṃ tassa tassa phalassa kāraṇākāraṇajānanaṃ,
atk-s0504a:643_6: tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ atītādibhedabhinnassa kammasamādānassa anavasesato yathābhūtaṃ vipākantarajānanaṃ,
atk-s0504a:643_7: āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva tassa tassa sattassa “ayaṃ nirayagāminī paṭipadā…pe…
atk-s0504a:643_9: khandhāyatanānaṃ upādinnānupādinnādianekasabhāvaṃ nānāsabhāvañca tassa lokassa “imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā
atk-s0504a:643_10: imasmiṃ dhammappabandhe ayaṃ viseso jāyatī”tiādinā nayena yathābhūtaṃ dhātunānattajānanaṃ,
atk-s0504a:643_12: sattānaṃ aparimāṇāsu jātīsu tappaṭibandhena saddhiṃ anavasesato pubbenivutthakkhandhasantatijānanaṃ hīnādivibhāgehi saddhiṃ cutipaṭisandhijānanaṃ,
atk-s0504a:643_13: “idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva catusaccajānananti imāni bhagavato dasabalañāṇāni avirajjhitvā
atk-s0504a:643_14: yathāsakaṃvisayāvagāhanato yathādhippetatthasādhanato ca yathābhūtavuttiyā tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni.
atk-s0504a:644_0: “Idha tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”tiādi.
atk-s0504a:646_2: paññāvisesānaṃ vasena bhagavā tathāni ñāṇāni āgato adhigatoti tathāgato,
atk-s0504a:647_3: Yadatthaṃ tā lokanāthena abhipatthitā pavattitā ca,
atk-s0504a:647_4: tadatthassa ekantasiddhiyā avisaṃvādanato aviparītatthavuttiyā tathā avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0504a:647_5: Tathā hi ayaṃ bhagavā bodhisattabhūto samatiṃsapāramiparipūraṇādikaṃ vuttappakāraṃ sabbabuddhattahetuṃ
atk-s0504a:647_6: sampādetvā tusitapure ṭhito buddhakolāhalaṃ sutvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatāhi ekato sannipatitāhi upasaṅkamitvā –
atk-s0504a:650_0: Āyācito uppannapubbanimitto pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā “idāni ahaṃ manussayoniyaṃ uppajjitvā abhisambujjhissāmī”ti
atk-s0504a:650_1: āsāḷhipuṇṇamāyaṃ sakyarājakule mahāmāyāya deviyā kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasa māse devamanussehi
atk-s0504a:650_2: mahatā parihārena parihariyamāno visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ paccūsasamaye abhijātiṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0504a:651_0: Abhijātikkhaṇe panassa paṭisandhiggahaṇakkhaṇe viya dvattiṃsa pubbanimittāni pāturahesuṃ,
atk-s0504a:651_2: dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu aparimāṇo obhāso phari, tassa,
atk-s0504a:651_3: taṃ siriṃ daṭṭhukāmā viya andhā cakkhūni paṭilabhiṃsu,
atk-s0504a:651_17: aghaṭṭitāni eva manussānaṃ hatthūpagādīni ābharaṇāni madhurenākārena saddaṃ muñciṃsu,
atk-s0504a:651_25: upakkilesavinimutte sūriye dippamāne eva ākāsagatā sabbā jotiyo jotiṃsu,
atk-s0504a:651_26: ṭhapetvā arūpāvacare deve avasesā sabbe devā sabbe ca nerayikā dissamānarūpā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0504a:651_31: mahāsamuddo sabbatthakameva pañcavaṇṇehi padumehi sañchannatalo ahosi,
atk-s0504a:651_37: mahītalasilātalāni bhinditvā uparūpari satta satta hutvā daṇḍapadumāni nāma nikkhamiṃsu,
atk-s0504a:651_39: samantato pupphavassaṃ vassi ākāse dibbatūriyāni vajjiṃsu,
atk-s0504a:651_42: alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ mālāsanaṃ viya ca ekamālāmālinī vipphurantavāḷabījanī pupphadhūpagandhaparivāsitā paramasobhaggappattā ahosi,
atk-s0504a:651_43: tāni ca pubbanimittāni upari adhigatānaṃ anekesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ nimittabhūtāni eva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0504a:651_44: Evaṃ anekacchariyapātubhāvā ayaṃ abhijāti yadatthaṃ tena abhipatthitā,
atk-s0504a:651_45: tassā abhisambodhiyā ekantasiddhiyā tathāva ahosi avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0504a:652_1: te sabbepi anavasesato sayameva bhagavatā vinītā.
atk-s0504a:652_3: tepi sāvakādīhi vinītā vinayaṃ gacchanti gamissanti cāti yadatthaṃ bhagavatā abhisambodhi abhipatthitā,
atk-s0504a:652_4: tadatthassa ekantasiddhiyā abhisambodhi tathā avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0504a:653_0: Apica yassa yassa ñeyyadhammassa yo yo sabhāvo bujjhitabbo,
atk-s0504a:653_1: so so hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalakaṃ viya āvajjanamattapaṭibaddhena attano ñāṇena aviparītaṃ anavasesato
atk-s0504a:653_2: bhagavatā abhisambuddhoti evampi abhisambodhi tathā avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0504a:654_0: Tathā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ tathā tathā desetabbappakāraṃ,
atk-s0504a:654_1: tesaṃ tesañca sattānaṃ āsayānusayacariyādhimuttiṃ sammadeva oloketvā dhammataṃ avijahanteneva paññattinayaṃ
atk-s0504a:654_2: vohāramattaṃ anatidhāvanteneva ca dhammataṃ vibhāventena yathāparādhaṃ yathājjhāsayaṃ yathādhammañca
atk-s0504a:654_3: anusāsantena bhagavatā veneyyā vinītā ariyabhūmiṃ sampāpitāti dhammavinayapaññāpanāpissa tadatthasiddhiyā
atk-s0504a:655_0: Tathā yā sā bhagavatā anuppattā pathaviyādiphassavedanādirūpārūpasabhāvanimuttā lujjanapalujjanabhāvābhāvato
atk-s0504a:655_1: lokasabhāvātītā tamasā visaṃsaṭṭhattā kenaci anobhāsanīyā lokasabhāvābhāvato eva gatiādibhāvarahitā appatiṭṭhā
atk-s0504a:655_2: anārammaṇā amatamahānibbānadhātu khandhasaṅkhātānaṃ upādīnaṃ lesamattassāpi abhāvato “anupādisesā”tipi vuccati.
atk-s0504a:656_3: yattha neva pathavī na āpo na tejo na vāyo na ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ na viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ na ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ
atk-s0504a:656_4: na nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nāyaṃ loko na paro loko na ca ubho candimasūriyā. Tamahaṃ,
atk-s0504a:656_6: neva āgatiṃ vadāmi na gatiṃ na ṭhitiṃ na cutiṃ na upapattiṃ;
atk-s0504a:657_0: Sā sabbesampi upādānakkhandhānaṃ atthaṅgamo sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ samatho,
atk-s0504a:657_5: accantasantilakkhaṇāti yathāvuttasabhāvassa kadācipi avisaṃvādanato tathā avitathā anaññathā.
atk-s0504a:657_6: Evametā abhijātiādikā tathā gato upagato adhigato paṭipanno pattoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:658_14: tadaṅgavimuttiyā vikkhambhanavimuttiyā samucchedavimuttiyā paṭippassaddhivimuttiyā nissaraṇavimuttiyāti saṅkhepato,
atk-s0504a:658_21: rasmivemattanti imehi pañcahi vemattehi siyā vemattaṃ,
atk-s0504a:658_22: na pana sīlavisuddhiādīsu visuddhīsu samathavipassanāpaṭipattiyaṃ attanā paṭividdhaguṇesu ca kiñci nānākaraṇaṃ atthi,
atk-s0504a:658_23: atha kho majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya aññaṃmaññaṃ nibbisesā te buddhā bhagavanto.
atk-s0504a:658_28: Tathā hi lokiyā vidhayuttagatasadde pakāratthe vadanti.
atk-s0504a:659_1: Anaññasādhāraṇena iddhānubhāvena samannāgatattā atthapaṭisambhidādīnaṃ ukkaṃsapāramippattiyā anāvaraṇañāṇapaṭilābhena
atk-s0504a:659_2: ca bhagavato kāyappavattiyādīnaṃ katthaci paṭighātābhāvato yathāruci tathā gataṃ gati gamanaṃ kāyavacīcittappavatti
atk-s0504a:660_1: Bodhisambhārasambharaṇe tappaṭipakkhappavattisaṅkhātaṃ natthi etassa gatanti agato.
atk-s0504a:660_2: So panassa agatabhāvo maccheradānapāramiādīsu aviparītaṃ ādīnavānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇādinayappavattehi ñāṇehīti tathehi ñāṇehi agatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:661_0: Atha vā kilesābhisaṅkhārappavattisaṅkhātaṃ khandhappavattisaṅkhātameva vā pañcasupi gatīsu gataṃ gamanaṃ etassa natthīti agato.
atk-s0504a:661_1: Saupādisesaanupādisesanibbānappattiyā svāyamassa agatabhāvo tathehi ariyamaggañāṇehīti evampi bhagavā tathehi āgatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:662_6: Saddhammo hi ariyamaggo tāva yathā yuganaddhasamathavipassanābalena anavasesakilesapakkhaṃ samūhanantena samucchedappahānavasena gantabbaṃ,
atk-s0504a:662_8: Phaladhammo yathā attano maggānurūpaṃ paṭippassaddhippahānavasena gantabbaṃ,
atk-s0504a:662_10: Nibbānadhammo pana yathā gato paññāya paṭividdho sakalavaṭṭadukkhavūpasamāya sampajjati,
atk-s0504a:662_12: Pariyattidhammopi yathā purimabuddhehi suttageyyādivasena pavattiādippakāsanavasena ca veneyyānaṃ āsayādianurūpaṃ pavattito,
atk-s0504a:662_13: amhākampi bhagavatā tathā gato gadito pavattitoti vā tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:662_15: tathā bhagavato sāvakehi gato avagatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:663_2: yathā attahitāya parahitāya ca paṭipannehi suvisuddhaṃ pubbabhāgasamathavipassanāpaṭipadaṃ purakkhatvā tena tena maggena gantabbaṃ,
atk-s0504a:663_5: tathā ca buddhattā tathā gadanato ca tathāgato.
atk-s0504a:664_1: sabbākārena pana tathāgatova tathāgatassa tathāgatabhāvaṃ vaṇṇeyya.
atk-s0504a:664_5: tassa appamādapadassa viya tepiṭakampi buddhavacanaṃ yuttito atthabhāvena āharanto “atitthena dhammakathiko pakkhando”ti na vattabboti.
atk-s0504a:714_0: Arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhanti ettha arahāti padassa attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
atk-s0504a:714_3: tassa sabbassapi sabbākārato aviparītato sayameva abhisambuddhattāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0504a:714_4: Imināssa paropadesarahitassa sabbākārena sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthassa ākaṅkhāpaṭibaddhavuttino anāvaraṇañāṇasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0504a:715_1: aññathā cha asādhāraṇāni ñāṇāni buddhañāṇānīti vacanaṃ virujjheyyāti?
atk-s0504a:715_3: visayappavattibhedavasena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ ekasseva ñāṇassa dvidhā vuttattā.
atk-s0504a:715_5: tattha ca āvaraṇābhāvato nissaṅgacāramupādāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:717_2: Aññathā sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇānaṃ sādhāraṇatā asabbadhammārammaṇatā ca āpajjeyya.
atk-s0504a:717_3: Na hi bhagavato ñāṇassa aṇumattampi āvaraṇaṃ atthi,
atk-s0504a:717_4: anāvaraṇañāṇassa ca asabbadhammārammaṇabhāve yattha taṃ na pavattati tatthāvaraṇasabbhāvato anāvaraṇabhāvoyeva na siyā.
atk-s0504a:717_5: Atha vā pana hotu aññameva anāvaraṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇato,
atk-s0504a:717_6: idha pana sabbattha appaṭihatavuttitāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti sabbaññutaññāṇameva adhippetaṃ,
atk-s0504a:717_7: tassevādhigamena bhagavā sabbaññū sabbavidū sammāsambuddhoti vuccati,
atk-s0504a:718_0: “Vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ buddho”ti.
atk-s0504a:719_0: Sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthañāṇasamadhigamena hi bhagavato santāne anavasesadhamme paṭivijjhituṃ samatthatā ahosīti.
atk-s0504a:720_1: kiṃ panidaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattamānaṃ sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati,
atk-s0504a:720_4: yadi tāva sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati,
atk-s0504a:720_6: ekajjhaṃ upaṭṭhāne dūrato cittapaṭaṃ pekkhantassa viya visayavibhāgenāvabodho na siyā,
atk-s0504a:720_7: tathā ca sati “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti vipassantānaṃ anattākārena viya sabbadhammā anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇassa visayā hontīti āpajjati.
atk-s0504a:720_8: Yepi “sabbañeyyadhammānaṃ ṭhitalakkhaṇavisayaṃ vikapparahitaṃ sabbakālaṃ buddhānaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0504a:722_4: Tasmā sakiṃyeva ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti na yujjati.
atk-s0504a:723_0: Atha kamena sabbasmiṃ visaye ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti?
atk-s0504a:723_2: Na hi jātibhūmisabhāvādivasena disādesakālādivasena ca anekabhedabhinne ñeyye kamena gayhamāne tassa
atk-s0504a:723_4: Ye pana “atthassa avisaṃvādanato ñeyyassa ekadesaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā sesepi evanti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanena sabbaññū bhagavā,
atk-s0504a:723_8: Sabbassa hi apaccakkhabhāve atthassa avisaṃvādanena ñeyyassa ekadesaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā sesepi evanti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanassa asambhavato.
atk-s0504a:723_12: tassa sesabhāvo pana na siyāti sabbametaṃ akāraṇaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0504a:724_0: “Buddhavisayo, bhikkhave, acinteyyo, na cintetabbo; yo cinteyya, ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti.
atk-s0504a:725_1: yaṃkiñci bhagavatā ñātuṃ icchitaṃ sakalamekadeso vā,
atk-s0504a:725_4: ñātuṃ icchitassa sakalassa avisayabhāvato tassa ākaṅkhāpaṭibaddhavuttitā na siyā,
atk-s0504a:725_5: ekanteneva sā icchitabbā “sabbe dhammā buddhassa bhagavato āvajjanapaṭibaddhā,
atk-s0504a:726_0: Nanu ca etasmimpi pakkhe yadā sakalaṃ ñātuṃ icchitaṃ,
atk-s0504a:726_1: tadā sakimeva sakalavisayatāya anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavatteyyāti vuttadosānātivattiyevāti? Na,
atk-s0504a:726_4: Aññathā pacurajanañāṇasamavuttitāya buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ ñāṇassa acinteyyatā na siyā,
atk-s0504a:726_5: tasmā sakaladhammārammaṇampi taṃ ekadhammārammaṇaṃ viya suvavatthāpiteyeva te dhamme katvā pavattatīti idamettha acinteyyaṃ.
atk-s0504a:726_11: ñāṇapariyantikaṃ ñeyyanti evamekajjhaṃ visuṃ visuṃ sakiṃ kamena ca icchānurūpaṃ sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddho bhagavā.
atk-s0504a:727_7: Visayabhedena pana taṃ dvidhā katvā vuttaṃ “dve vitakkā”ti.
atk-s0504a:727_8: Samudācarantīti samaṃ sammā ca uddhamuddhaṃ mariyādāya caranti.
atk-s0504a:727_10: tena ca yogena “tathāgataṃ arahantaṃ sammāsambuddha”nti idaṃ sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:727_12: tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa attano visaye samaṃ sammā ca aññamaññaṃ mariyādaṃ anatikkamantā
atk-s0504a:728_2: kathañca taṃ anatikkamitvā te uddhamuddhaṃ bahulaṃ abhiṇhaṃ niccaṃ pavattantīti? Vuccate –
atk-s0504a:728_5: Tesu khemavitakko tāva bhagavato visesena karuṇāsampayutto,
atk-s0504a:728_7: tasmā so mahākaruṇāsamāpattiyā mettādisamāpattiyā ca pubbaṅgamo sampayutto ca veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:728_8: Pavivekavitakko pana phalasamāpattiyā pubbaṅgamo sampayutto ca,
atk-s0504a:728_11: tasmā ekasmiṃ santāne bahulaṃ pavattamānānampi kālena kālaṃ savisayasmiṃyeva caraṇato natthi mariyādā,
atk-s0504a:729_3: “ayaṃ loko santāpajāto dukkhapareto”tiādinā rāgaggiādīhi lokasannivāsassa ādittatādiākāradassanehi mahākaruṇāsamāpattiyā pubbabhāge,
atk-s0504a:730_0: “Bahūhi ākārehi passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati,
atk-s0504a:730_1: āditto lokasannivāsoti passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati. Uyyutto, payāto,
atk-s0504a:731_5: avijjāgato lokasannivāso aṇḍabhūto pariyonaddho tantākulakajāto kulāguṇṭhikajāto muñjapabbajabhūto apāyaṃ
atk-s0504a:734_0: “Jātiyā anugato, jarāya anusaṭo, byādhinā abhibhūto, maraṇena abbhāhato, dukkhe patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0504a:736_5: unnītako lokasannivāso haññati niccamatāṇo pattadaṇḍo takkaro,
atk-s0504a:737_0: “Andho, acakkhuko, hatanetto, apariṇāyako, vipathapakkhando, añjasāparaddho, mahoghapakkhando.
atk-s0504a:738_28: dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhigatehi pariyuṭṭhito lokasannivāsoti sampassantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamati.
atk-s0504a:739_17: parinibbuto pare ca parinibbāpetunti passantānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:740_0: Imināva nayena bhagavato sattesu mettāokkamanañca vibhāvetabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:740_1: Karuṇāvisayassa hi dukkhassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ sukhaṃ sattesu upasaṃharantī mettāpi pavattatīti idha abyāpādaavihiṃsāvitakkā khemavitakko.
atk-s0504a:740_3: tassa dibbavihāraariyavihāresu pubbabhāgassa paṭhamajjhānassa paccavekkhaṇāya ca vasena pavatti veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:740_4: Tattha ye te bhagavato devasikaṃ vaḷañjanakavasena catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā samāpattivihārā,
atk-s0504a:740_5: yesaṃ purecaraṇabhāvena pavattaṃ samādhicariyānugataṃ ñāṇacariyānugataṃ ñāṇaṃ catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasamāpattisañcārimahāvajirañāṇanti vuccati,
atk-s0504a:740_6: tesaṃ vasena bhagavato pavivekavitakkassa bahulaṃ pavatti veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:741_2: tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi,
atk-s0504a:742_0: Idañhi bhagavā “samaṇo gotamo abhirūpo pāsādiko suphusitaṃ dantāvaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0504a:742_5: yo evaṃ saññattibahulo caratī”ti saccakena nigaṇṭhaputtena vitakkite avassaṃ sahoḍhaṃ coraṃ gaṇhanto
atk-s0504a:742_6: viya “na aggivessana tathāgato parisaṃ rañjento saññattibahulo vicarati,
atk-s0504a:742_8: asallīno anupalitto ekattaṃ ekavihārisuññatāphalasamāpattiphalaṃ anuyutto”ti dassetuṃ āhari.
atk-s0504a:743_0: Bhagavā hi yasmiṃ khaṇe parisā sādhukāraṃ deti,
atk-s0504a:743_2: tasmiṃ khaṇe pubbabhāgena kālaṃ paricchinditvā phalasamāpattiṃ assāsavāre passāsavāre samāpajjati,
atk-s0504a:743_3: sādhukārasaddanigghose avicchinneyeva dhammapaccavekkhaṇāya ca pariyosāne samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0504a:743_6: Evaṃ yathāvuttasamāpattīnaṃ sapubbabhāgānaṃ vasena bhagavato khemavitakkassa pavivekavitakkassa ca bahulappavatti veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:744_0: Tattha yassa byāpādavihiṃsāvitakkādisaṃkilesappahānassa abyāpādavitakkassa avihiṃsāvitakkassa ca ānubhāvena
atk-s0504a:744_1: kutocipi bhayābhāvato taṃsamaṅgī khemappatto ca viharati,
atk-s0504a:744_2: tato ca sabbassapi sabbadāpi khemameva hoti abhayameva.
atk-s0504a:744_4: Yassa pana kāmavitakkādisaṃkilesapahānassa nekkhammavitakkassa ānubhāvena kāyaviveko,
atk-s0504a:744_11: nissaraṇavivekoti pañcavidho ca viveko pāripūriṃ gacchati.
atk-s0504a:744_12: So yathārahaṃ ārammaṇato sampayogato ca pavivekasahagato vitakkoti pavivekavitakko.
atk-s0504a:744_13: Ete ca dve vitakkā evaṃ vibhattavisayāpi samānā ādikammikānaṃ aññamaññūpakārāya sambhavanti.
atk-s0504a:744_14: Yathā hi khemavitakkassa pavivekavitakko anuppannassa uppādāya uppannassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya hoti,
atk-s0504a:744_16: Na hi vūpakaṭṭhakāyacittānamantarena mettāvihārādayo sambhavanti byāpādādippahānena ca vinā cittavivekādīnaṃ
atk-s0504a:744_17: asambhavoyevāti aññamaññassa bahūpakārā ete dhammā daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0504a:744_18: Bhagavato pana sabbaso pahīnasaṃkilesassa lokahitatthāya evaṃ khemavitakko ca pavivekavitakko ca assāsavāramattepi hitasukhamāvahantiyevāti.
atk-s0504a:744_19: Khemo ca vitakko paviveko ca vitakkoti sambandhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:745_7: Na kañci byābādhemīti hīnādīsu kañcipi sattaṃ taṇhātasādiyogato tasaṃ vā tadabhāvato pahīnasabbakilesavipphanditattā
atk-s0504a:745_8: thāvaraṃ vā na bādhemi na dukkhāpemi.
atk-s0504a:745_12: ‘ahaṃ imāya iriyāya imāya paṭipattiyā evaṃ sammā paṭipajjanto evaṃ samāpattivihārehi viharanto evaṃ puññatthikehi
atk-s0504a:745_13: katāni sakkāragarukāramānanavandanapūjanāni adhivāsento sattesu na kañci byābādhemi,
atk-s0504a:746_1: taṃ pahīnanti yaṃ diyaḍḍhakilesasahassabhedaṃ aññañca taṃsampayuttaṃ anantappabhedaṃ akusalaṃ,
atk-s0504a:746_2: taṃ sabbaṃ bodhimūleyeva mayhaṃ pahīnaṃ samūhatanti.
atk-s0504a:746_3: Iminā pavivekesu muddhabhūtena saddhiṃ nissaraṇavivekena samucchedappaṭippassaddhiviveke dasseti.
atk-s0504a:746_5: Āgamanīyapaṭipadāya hi saddhiṃ bhagavatā attano kilesakkhayo idha vuttoti.
atk-s0504a:747_0: Iti bhagavā aparimitakappaparicittaṃ attano pavivekajjhāsayaṃ saddhiṃ nissaraṇajjhāsayena idāni matthakaṃ
atk-s0504a:747_1: pāpetvā ṭhito tamajjhāsayaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā attano kilesappahānapaccavekkhaṇamukhena vibhāveti.
atk-s0504a:747_2: Yadatthaṃ panettha satthā ime dve vitakke uddhari,
atk-s0504a:747_5: Bhagavā hi imassa vitakkadvayassa attano bahulasamudācāradassanamukheneva tattha bhikkhū nivesetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0504a:748_0: Tattha tasmāti yasmā abyāpajjhapavivekābhiratassa me khemapavivekavitakkāyeva bahulaṃ pavattanti, tasmā.
atk-s0504a:748_2: Abyāpajjhārāmā viharathāti sabbasattesu mettāvihārena karuṇāvihāre na ca abhiramantā viharatha.
atk-s0504a:748_5: Pavivekārāmā viharathāti kāyādivivekañceva tadaṅgādivivekañcāti sabbaviveke āramitabbaṭṭhānaṃ katvā viharatha.
atk-s0504a:748_6: Imāya mayantiādi yathā nesaṃ khemavitakkassa pavattanākāradassanaṃ,
atk-s0504a:748_8: Tattha yathā anavajjadhamme paripūretukāmena kiṃkusalagavesinā hutvā kusaladhammapariyesanā kātabbāva,
atk-s0504a:748_9: sāvajjadhamme pajahitukāmenāpi akusalapariyesanā kātabbāti āha “kiṃ akusala”ntiādi.
atk-s0504a:748_11: Tattha kiṃ akusalanti akusalaṃ nāma kiṃ,
atk-s0504a:748_13: kāni vā rasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānīti akusalassa sabhāvakiccādito paccavekkhaṇavidhiṃ dasseti.
atk-s0504a:748_15: kiṃ appahīnaṃ kiṃ pajahāmāti idaṃ padadvayaṃ sekkhavasena.
atk-s0504a:748_16: Tasmā kiṃ appahīnanti kāmarāgasaṃyojanādīsu akusalesu kiṃ akusalaṃ amhākaṃ maggena asamucchinnaṃ?
atk-s0504a:748_18: Atha vā kiṃ pajahāmāti vītikkamapariyuṭṭhānānusayesu kiṃ vibhāgaṃ akusalaṃ idāni mayaṃ pajahāmāti attho.
atk-s0504a:748_20: Tesaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanādivasena anekabhedesu akusalesu kiṃ katamaṃ akusalaṃ,
atk-s0504a:748_22: katamena vā maggena amhākaṃ appahīnanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0504a:749_0: Gāthāsu buddhanti catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ aviparītaṃ sayambhuñāṇena buddhattā paṭividdhattā buddhaṃ saccavinimuttassa ñeyyassa abhāvato.
atk-s0504a:751_0: Pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ me, tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇā”ti. ;
atk-s0504a:752_0: Ṭhapetvā mahābodhisattaṃ aññehi sahituṃ vahituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā asayhassa sakalassa bodhisambhārassa mahākaruṇādhikārassa ca sahanato vahanato,
atk-s0504a:752_1: tathā aññehi sahituṃ abhibhavituṃ dukkarattā asayhānaṃ pañcannaṃ mārānaṃ sahanato abhibhavanato,
atk-s0504a:752_3: anusāsanasaṅkhātassa aññehi asayhassa buddhakiccassa sahanato vahanato,
atk-s0504a:753_0: Sakaparasantānesu tamasaṅkhātaṃ mohandhakāraṃ nudi khipīti tamonudo.
atk-s0504a:753_2: Atha vā “mutto moceyya”ntiādinā nayena pavattitassa mahābhinīhārassa sakalassa vā saṃsāradukkhassa sabbaññuguṇānaṃ pāraṃ pariyantaṃ gatoti pāragato,
atk-s0504a:753_5: sīlādiṃ dasabalañāṇādiñca sammāsambuddhehi pattabbaṃ sabbaṃ pattanti attho.
atk-s0504a:753_7: ariyiddhisaṅkhāto anaññasādhāraṇo cittavasibhāvo ca assa atthīti vasimā,
atk-s0504a:753_11: Kāyavisamādikassa visamassa vantattā vā visasaṅkhātaṃ sabbaṃ kilesamalaṃ taritvā vā visaṃ sakalavaṭṭadukkhaṃ
atk-s0504a:753_12: sayaṃ taritvā tāraṇato visantaro taṃ visantaraṃ.
atk-s0504a:753_14: ubhayamhi gamanato monasaṅkhātena ñāṇena kāyamoneyyādīhi vā sātisayaṃ samannāgatattā muniṃ.
atk-s0504a:753_32: Tato eva jarāhetusamucchedato anupādisesanibbānappattivasena pākaṭajarādisabbajarāya pāraguṃ.
atk-s0504a:753_33: Jarāsīsena cettha jātimaraṇasokādīnaṃ pāragamanaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:753_34: Taṃ evaṃbhūtaṃ tathāgataṃ duve vitakkā samudācarantīti brūmīti sambandho.
atk-s0504a:754_0: Iti bhagavā paṭhamagāthāya vitakkadvayaṃ uddisitvā tato dutiyagāthāya pavivekavitakkaṃ dassetvā idāni
atk-s0504a:754_2: Tattha sele yathā pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhitoti sele silāmaye ekagghanapabbatamuddhani yathā ṭhito.
atk-s0504a:754_3: Na hi tattha ṭhitassa uddhaṃ gīvukkhipanapasāraṇādikiccaṃ atthi.
atk-s0504a:754_6: yathā selapabbatamuddhani ṭhito cakkhumā puriso samantato janataṃ passeyya,
atk-s0504a:754_8: sundarapañño sabbaññutaññāṇena samantacakkhu bhagavā dhammamayaṃ paññāmayaṃ pāsādamāruyha sayaṃ apetasoko
atk-s0504a:754_9: sokāvatiṇṇaṃ jātijarābhibhūtañca janataṃ sattakāyaṃ avekkhati upadhārayati upaparikkhati.
atk-s0504a:754_11: yathā hi pabbatapāde samantā mahantaṃ khettaṃ katvā tattha kedārapāḷīsu kuṭiyo katvā rattiṃ aggiṃ jāleyya,
atk-s0504a:754_13: athassa pabbatassa matthake ṭhatvā cakkhumato purisassa bhūmippadesaṃ olokayato neva khettaṃ,
atk-s0504a:754_18: evaṃ dhammamayaṃ pāsādamāruyha sattakāyaṃ olokayato tathāgatassa ye te akatakalyāṇā sattā,
atk-s0504a:754_19: te ekavihāre dakkhiṇapasse nisinnāpi buddhañāṇassa āpāthaṃ nāgacchanti,
atk-s0504a:754_22: te evassa dūrepi ṭhitā āpāthaṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0504a:754_23: so aggi viya himavantapabbato viya ca vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0504a:756_0: Asantettha na dissanti, rattiṃ khittā yathā sarā”ti. ;
atk-s0504a:757_0: Evametasmiṃ sutte gāthāsu ca bhagavā attānaṃ paraṃ viya katvā dassesi.
atk-s0504a:760_4: yena maṃ pariyāyena sammā vadamāno vadeyya –
atk-s0504a:760_8: Idha pana vārepi kāraṇepi vaṭṭati, tasmā,
atk-s0504a:760_10: tathāgatassa dve dhammadesanā yathārahaṃ kāraṇena bhavanti,
atk-s0504a:760_12: Bhagavā hi veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ kadāci “ime dhammā kusalā, ime,
atk-s0504a:760_17: ime na sevitabbā”tiādinā kusalākusaladhamme vibhajanto kusaladhammehi akusaladhamme asaṅkarato paññāpento “pāpaṃ pāpakato passathā”ti dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0504a:760_20: āsevito bhāvito bahulīkato nirayasaṃvattaniko tiracchānayonisaṃvattaniko pettivisayasaṃvattaniko,
atk-s0504a:760_22: so appāyukasaṃvattaniko”tiādinā ādīnavaṃ pakāsento pāpato nibbidādīhi niyojento “nibbindatha virajjathā”ti dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0504a:761_1: Pāpaṃ pāpakato passathāti sabbaṃ pāpadhammaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme āyatiñca ahitadukkhāvahato lāmakato passatha.
atk-s0504a:761_2: Tattha nibbindathāti tasmiṃ pāpadhamme “accantahīnabhāvato lāmakaṭṭhena pāpaṃ,
atk-s0504a:761_4: pakatipabhassarassa pasannassa ca cittassa pabhassarādibhāvavināsanato saṃkilesikaṃ,
atk-s0504a:761_8: aparimāṇampi kālaṃ anāgate jātijarāmaraṇanibbattanato āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyaṃ,
atk-s0504a:761_10: tassa ca pahāne ānisaṃse sammapaññāya passantā nibbindatha nibbedaṃ āpajjatha.
atk-s0504a:761_11: Nibbindantā ca vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyamaggādhigamena pāpato virajjatha ceva vimuccatha ca.
atk-s0504a:761_16: Yaṃ aniccadukkhādibhāvena kucchitaṃ ariyehi jigucchanīyaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ pāpetīti pāpaṃ.
atk-s0504a:761_19: Yathāvuttena atthena pāpakato disvā tattha aniccato, dukkhato, rogato, gaṇḍato, sallato, aghato,
atk-s0504a:761_21: Ayaṃ dutiyāti yāthāvato ahitānatthavibhāvanaṃ paṭhamaṃ upādāya tato vivecanaṃ ayaṃ dutiyā dhammadesanā.
atk-s0504a:762_6: Tatthāti tasmiṃ pāpake virajjatha rāgaṃ pajahathāti attho.
atk-s0504a:765_2: upanissayavasena cāti dvīhi ākārehi pubbaṅgamā purassarā padhānakāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0504a:765_3: Na hi avijjāya vinā akusaluppatti atthi.
atk-s0504a:765_6: Tattha akusalappavattiyā ādīnavappaṭicchādanena ayonisomanasikārassa paccayabhāvena appahīnabhāvena ca akusaladhammānaṃ upanissayabhāvo dissati.
atk-s0504a:766_0: Evaṃ byādhimaraṇādidukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato sabbāpi gatiyo idha duggatiyo.
atk-s0504a:766_1: Atha vā rāgādikilesehi dūsitā gatiyo kāyavacīcittānaṃ pavattiyoti duggatiyo,
atk-s0504a:766_3: Asmiṃ loketi idha loke manussagatiyaṃ vā.
atk-s0504a:766_5: Avijjāmūlikā sabbāti tā sabbāpi duccaritassa vipattiyo vuttanayena avijjāpubbaṅgamattā avijjāmūlikā eva.
atk-s0504a:766_7: sampattavisayalubbhanalakkhaṇena lobhena ca samussitā upacitāti icchālobhasamussayā.
atk-s0504a:767_0: Yatoti yasmā avijjāhetu avijjāya nivuto hutvā.
atk-s0504a:767_1: Pāpicchoti avijjāya paṭicchāditattā pāpicchatāya ādīnave apassanto asantaguṇasambhāvanavasena kohaññādīni karonto pāpiccho,
atk-s0504a:767_3: Anādaroti lokādhipatino ottappassa abhāvena sabrahmacārīsu ādararahito.
atk-s0504a:767_6: Apāyaṃ tena gacchatīti tena tathā pasutena pāpena nirayādibhedaṃ apāyaṃ gacchati upapajjati.
atk-s0504a:768_0: Tasmāti yasmā ete evaṃ sabbaduccaritamūlabhūtā sabbaduggatiparikkilesahetubhūtā ca avijjādayo,
atk-s0504a:768_11: sabbā pañcapi gatiyo jahe pajaheyya samatikkameyya.
atk-s0504a:768_12: Kilesavaṭṭappahāneneva hi kammavaṭṭaṃ vipākavaṭṭañca pahīnaṃ hotīti.
atk-s0504a:772_2: Ye ariyāya paññāya parihīnāti ye sattā pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayabbayapaṭivijjhanena catusaccapaṭivijjhanena
atk-s0504a:772_3: ca kilesehi ārakā ṭhitattā ariyāya parisuddhāya vipassanāpaññāya ca maggapaññāya ca parihīnā,
atk-s0504a:772_4: te lokiyalokuttarāhi sampattīhi ativiya parihīnā mahājānikā.
atk-s0504a:772_7: Te hi micchattaniyatabhāvato ekantena parihīnā aparipuṇṇā mahājānikā.
atk-s0504a:772_10: Atha vā sukkapakkhe aparihīnā nāma tividhāvaraṇavirahitā sammādiṭṭhikā kammassakatañāṇena ca samannāgatā.
atk-s0504a:773_5: Niviṭṭhaṃ nāmarūpasminti nāmarūpe upādānakkhandhapañcake “etaṃ mamā”tiādinā taṇhādiṭṭhivasena abhiniviṭṭhaṃ ajjhositaṃ,
atk-s0504a:773_6: tato eva idaṃ saccanti maññatīti “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti maññati.
atk-s0504a:774_0: Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya saṃkilesapakkhaṃ dassetvā idāni yassā anuppattiyā nāmarūpasmiṃ maññanābhinivesehi kilesavaṭṭaṃ vattati,
atk-s0504a:774_1: tassā uppattiyā vaṭṭassa upacchedoti paññāya ānubhāvaṃ pakāsento “paññā hi seṭṭhā lokasmi”nti gāthamāha.
atk-s0504a:775_4: paññāya ca siddhāya sabbe anavajjadhammā siddhā eva honti.
atk-s0504a:775_11: yā ayaṃ paññā anibbiddhapubbaṃ apadālitapubbaṃ lobhakkhandhādiṃ nibbijjhantī padālentī gacchati pavattatīti nibbedhagāminī,
atk-s0504a:775_12: yāya ca tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu sattanikāyesu khandhānaṃ paṭhamābhinibbattisaṅkhātāya
atk-s0504a:775_13: jātiyā taṃnimittassa ca kammabhavassa parikkhayaṃ pariyosānaṃ nibbānaṃ arahattañca sammā aviparītaṃ jānāti
atk-s0504a:776_0: Idāni yathāvuttapaññānubhāvasampanne khīṇāsave abhitthavanto “tesaṃ devā manussā cā”ti osānagāthamāha.
atk-s0504a:776_2: tesaṃ catūsu ariyasaccesu pariññādīnaṃ soḷasannaṃ kiccānaṃ niṭṭhitattā catusaccasambodhena sambuddhānaṃ,
atk-s0504a:776_5: pubbabhāge vā sīlādipāripūrito paṭṭhāya yāva nibbānasacchikiriyāya hāsavedatuṭṭhipāmojjabahulatāya hāsapaññānaṃ,
atk-s0504a:776_6: sabbaso parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojanattā antimasarīradhārīnaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ devā manussā ca pihayanti piyā honti,
atk-s0504a:776_8: aho vata mayampi edisā evaṃ nittiṇṇasabbadukkhā bhaveyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0504a:779_2: sukkabhāvāya pana paramavodānāya saṃvattantīti nipphattisukkatāya sukkā.
atk-s0504a:779_3: Sarasenapi sabbe kusalā dhammā sukkā eva kaṇhabhāvapaṭipakkhato.
atk-s0504a:779_4: Tesañhi uppattiyā cittaṃ pabhassaraṃ hoti parisuddhaṃ.
atk-s0504a:779_8: Hirī ca ottappañcāti ettha hiriyati hiriyitabbena,
atk-s0504a:781_0: Tattha ajjhattasamuṭṭhānaṃ hiriṃ catūhi kāraṇehi samuṭṭhāpeti –
atk-s0504a:781_7: mādisassa jātisampannassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ tāva jātiṃ paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpakammaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0504a:781_9: mādisassa vaye ṭhitassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ vayaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpakammaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0504a:781_11: mādisassa sūrabhāvasampannassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ sūrabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpakammaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0504a:781_14: mādisassa paṇḍitassa bahussutassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ bāhusaccaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpakammaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0504a:781_15: Evaṃ ajjhattasamuṭṭhānaṃ hiriṃ catūhi kāraṇehi samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0504a:781_16: Samuṭṭhāpetvā ca pana attano citte hiriṃ pavesetvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0504a:785_0: Paccavekkhanto hi bahiddhāsamuṭṭhitena ottappena pāpakammaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0504a:786_1: Idhekacco kulaputto attānaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā “mādisassa saddhāpabbajitassa bahussutassa dhutavādissa
atk-s0504a:786_2: na yuttaṃ pāpakammaṃ kātu”nti pāpakammaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0504a:788_1: Idhekacco kulaputto lokaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0504a:789_1: Mahantasmiṃ kho pana lokasannivāse santi samaṇabrāhmaṇā iddhimanto dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduno,
atk-s0504a:789_5: tepi maṃ evaṃ jānissanti ‘passatha bho imaṃ kulaputtaṃ,
atk-s0504a:789_6: saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti.
atk-s0504a:789_11: tāpi maṃ evaṃ jānissanti ‘passatha bho imaṃ,
atk-s0504a:789_13: saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti.
atk-s0504a:789_14: So lokaṃyeva adhipatiṃ katvā akusalaṃ pajahatī”ti.
atk-s0504a:791_5: Tattha yathā dvīsu ayoguḷesu eko sītalo bhaveyya gūthamakkhito,
atk-s0504a:791_7: Tesu yathā sītalaṃ gūthamakkhitattā jigucchanto viññujātiko na gaṇhāti,
atk-s0504a:791_9: evaṃ paṇḍito lajjāya jigucchanto pāpaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0504a:792_5: sabrahmacārimahattapaccavekkhaṇāti catūhi kāraṇehi tattha gāravena sappatissavalakkhaṇaṃ hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā pāpaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0504a:792_9: duggatibhayanti catūhi kāraṇehi vajjato bhāyanto vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvilakkhaṇaṃ ottappaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā pāpaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0504a:792_10: Ettha ca ajjhattasamuṭṭhānāditā hirottappānaṃ tattha tattha pākaṭabhāvena vuttā,
atk-s0504a:793_2: dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ na pāleyyunti bhikkhave,
atk-s0504a:793_3: ime dve anavajjadhammā yadi lokaṃ na rakkheyyuṃ,
atk-s0504a:793_5: Nayidha paññāyetha mātāti idha imasmiṃ loke janikā mātā “ayaṃ me mātā”ti garucittīkāravasena na paññāyetha,
atk-s0504a:793_14: Ete hi sattā “ayaṃ me mātā”ti vā “mātucchā”ti vā garucittīkāravasena na jānanti,
atk-s0504a:793_19: yathā ajeḷakādayo tiracchānā hirottapparahitā mātādisaññaṃ akatvā bhinnamariyādā sabbattha sambhedena vattanti,
atk-s0504a:793_20: evamayaṃ manussaloko yadi lokapālakadhammā na bhaveyyuṃ,
atk-s0504a:794_0: Gāthāsu yesaṃ ce hiriottappanti ceti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0504a:794_1: Yesaṃ sattānaṃ hirī ca ottappañca sabbadāva sabbakālameva na vijjati na upalabbhati.
atk-s0504a:794_2: Vokkantā sukkamūlā teti te sattā kusalamūlapacchedāvahassāpi kammassa karaṇato kusalakammānaṃ patiṭṭhānabhūtānaṃ
atk-s0504a:794_6: punappunaṃ jāyanamīyanasabhāvattā jātimaraṇagāmino saṃsāraṃ nātivattantīti attho.
atk-s0504a:795_0: Yesañca hiriottappanti yesaṃ pana parisuddhamatīnaṃ sattānaṃ hirī ca ottappañcāti ime dhammā sadā sabbakālaṃ
atk-s0504a:795_1: rattindivaṃ navamajjhimattherakālesu sammā upagamma ṭhitā pāpā jigucchantā bhāyantā tadaṅgādivasena pāpaṃ
atk-s0504a:795_3: Virūḷhabrahmacariyāti sāsanabrahmacariye maggabrahmacariye ca virūḷhaṃ āpannā,
atk-s0504a:795_4: aggamaggādhigamena sabbaso santakilesatāya santaguṇatāya vā santo,
atk-s0504a:798_3: Ekadivasaṃ kira bhagavatā anekapariyāyena saṃsāre ādīnavaṃ pakāsetvā tadupasamanādivasena nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttāya
atk-s0504a:798_4: dhammadesanāya katāya bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi “ayaṃ saṃsāro bhagavatā avijjādīhi kāraṇehi sahetuko vutto,
atk-s0504a:798_5: nibbānassa pana tadupasamassa na kiñci kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0504a:798_9: natthi hi paramatthato nibbānaṃ nāma anupalabbhamānasabhāvattā”ti lokāyatikādayo viya vippaṭipannānaṃ
atk-s0504a:798_11: amatamahānibbānassa paramatthato atthibhāvadīpanatthaṃ tassa ca nissaraṇabhāvādiānubhāvavantatādīpanatthaṃ pītivegena udānavasena idaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0504a:798_12: Tathā hi idaṃ suttaṃ udānepi saṅgītaṃ.
atk-s0504a:799_1: Ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhatanti sabbānipi padāni aññamaññavevacanāni.
atk-s0504a:799_2: Atha vā vedanādayo viya hetupaccayasamavāyasaṅkhātāya kāraṇasāmaggiyā na jātaṃ na nibbattanti ajātaṃ.
atk-s0504a:799_3: Kāraṇena vinā sayameva na bhūtaṃ na pātubhūtaṃ na uppannanti abhūtaṃ.
atk-s0504a:799_4: Evaṃ ajātattā abhūtattā ca yena kenaci kāraṇena na katanti akataṃ.
atk-s0504a:799_6: na asaṅkhatasabhāvassa nibbānassāti dassanatthaṃ asaṅkhatanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:799_7: Paṭilomato vā samecca sambhuyya paccayehi katanti saṅkhataṃ,
atk-s0504a:799_9: saṅkhatalakkhaṇarahitanti ca asaṅkhatanti evaṃ anekehi kāraṇehi nibbattitabhāve paṭisiddhe “siyā nu kho
atk-s0504a:799_10: ekeneva kāraṇena kata”nti āsaṅkāyaṃ “na kenaci kata”nti dassanatthaṃ “akata”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:799_11: Evaṃ appaccayampi samānaṃ “sayameva nu kho idaṃ bhūtaṃ pātubhūta”nti āsaṅkāyaṃ tannivattanatthaṃ “abhūta”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:799_12: Ayañca etassa asaṅkhatākatābhūtabhāvo sabbena sabbaṃ ajātidhammattāti dassetuṃ “ajāta”nti vuttanti.
atk-s0504a:800_2: ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti paramatthato nibbānassa atthibhāvaṃ vatvā tattha hetuṃ dassento “no cetaṃ,
atk-s0504a:800_6: yadi ajātādisabhāvā asaṅkhatā dhātu na abhavissa na siyā,
atk-s0504a:800_7: idha loke jātādisabhāvassa rūpādikkhandhapañcakasaṅkhātassa saṅkhāragatassa nissaraṇaṃ anavasesavaṭṭupasamo
atk-s0504a:800_8: na paññāyeyya na upalabbheyya na sambhaveyya.
atk-s0504a:800_9: Nibbānañhi ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānā sammādiṭṭhiādayo ariyamaggadhammā anavasesato kilese samucchindanti,
atk-s0504a:800_10: tenettha sabbassapi vaṭṭadukkhassa appavatti apagamo nissaraṇaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0504a:801_0: Evaṃ byatirekavasena nibbānassa atthibhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni anvayavasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “yasmā ca kho”tiādi vuttaṃ,
atk-s0504a:801_7: Idampi kho ṭhānaṃ duddasaṃ yadidaṃ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo.
atk-s0504a:801_10: dhammaṃ desessāmi asaṅkhatagāminiñca paṭipada”ntiādīhi anekehi suttapadehi “atthi,
atk-s0504a:801_12: ajāta”nti imināpi suttena nibbānadhātuyā paramatthato sabbhāvo sabbalokaṃ anukampamānena sammāsambuddhena desito,
atk-s0504a:801_14: Tattha appaccakkhakārīnampi viññūnaṃ kaṅkhā vā vimati vā natthi eva.
atk-s0504a:801_17: yathā pariññeyyatāya sauttarānaṃ kāmānaṃ rūpānañca paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ tabbidhurasabhāvaṃ nissaraṇaṃ paññāyati,
atk-s0504a:801_18: evaṃ taṃsabhāvānaṃ sabbesaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtena tabbidhurasabhāvena nissaraṇena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0504a:801_22: saṅkhatadhammārammaṇaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ api anulomañāṇaṃ kilese samucchedavasena pajahituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0504a:801_23: tathā sammutisaccārammaṇaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu ñāṇaṃ vikkhambhanavaseneva kilese pajahati,
atk-s0504a:801_25: Iti saṅkhatadhammārammaṇassa sammutisaccārammaṇassa ca ñāṇassa kilesānaṃ samucchedappahāne asamatthabhāvato
atk-s0504a:801_26: tesaṃ samucchedappahānakarassa ariyamaggañāṇassa tadubhayaviparītasabhāvena ārammaṇena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0504a:801_30: ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti idaṃ nibbānassa paramatthato atthibhāvajotakavacanaṃ aviparītatthaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitattā.
atk-s0504a:801_32: taṃ aviparītatthaṃ paramatthanti yathā taṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā,
atk-s0504a:801_35: Tathā nibbānasaddo katthaci visaye yathābhūtaparamatthavisayo upacāravuttisabbhāvato seyyathāpi sīhasaddo.
atk-s0504a:801_36: Atha vā attheva paramatthato asaṅkhatādhātu itaratabbiparītavinimuttasabhāvattā seyyathāpi pathavīdhātu vedanāti.
atk-s0504a:801_37: Evamādīhi nayehi yuttitopi asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā paramatthato atthibhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:802_7: Saṅkhatanti tehiyeva samecca sambhuyya katanti saṅkhataṃ,
atk-s0504a:802_10: Jarāya maraṇena ca ekanteneva saṅghaṭitaṃ saṃsaṭṭhanti jarāmaraṇasaṅghātaṃ.
atk-s0504a:802_12: jarāya maraṇena ca upaddutaṃ pīḷitanti attho.
atk-s0504a:802_13: Akkhirogādīnaṃ anekesaṃ rogānaṃ nīḷaṃ kulāvakanti roganīḷaṃ.
atk-s0504a:803_0: Catubbidho āhāro ca taṇhāsaṅkhātā netti ca pabhavo samuṭṭhānaṃ etassāti āhāranettippabhavaṃ.
atk-s0504a:803_2: Idha pana taṇhāya nettiggahaṇena gahitattā taṇhāvajjā veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:803_3: Tasmā āhāro ca netti ca pabhavo etassāti āhāranettippabhavaṃ.
atk-s0504a:803_4: Āhāro eva vā nayanaṭṭhena pavattanaṭṭhena nettīti evampi āhāranettippabhavaṃ.
atk-s0504a:803_5: Nālaṃ tadabhinanditunti taṃ upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ evaṃ paccayādhīnavuttikaṃ,
atk-s0504a:803_7: dukkhañca taṇhādiṭṭhīhi abhinandituṃ assādetuṃ na yuttaṃ.
atk-s0504a:804_0: Tassa nissaraṇanti “jātaṃ bhūta”ntiādinā vuttassa tassa sakkāyassa nissaraṇaṃ nikkamo anupasantasabhāvassa
atk-s0504a:804_1: rāgādikilesassa sabbasaṅkhārassa ca abhāvena tadupasamabhāvena pasatthabhāvena ca santaṃ,
atk-s0504a:804_10: tato eva accantasukhatāya sukhoti sabbapadehi amatamahānibbānameva thometi.
atk-s0504a:807_5: imasmiṃ vā adhigate vānassa abhāvoti nibbānaṃ,

atk-s0504a:857_7: Tattha ye suttāti ye kilesaniddāya suttā,
atk-s0504a:857_9: Suttā jāgaritaṃ seyyoti idaṃ pabodhassa kāraṇavacanaṃ.
atk-s0504a:857_10: Yasmā yathāvuttasupato vuttappakāraṃ jāgaritaṃ jāgaraṇaṃ atthakāmassa kulaputtassa seyyo pāsaṃsataro hitasukhāvaho,

atk-s0504a:858_16: So ekodi bhūto jātoti sabbaṃ purimasadisameva.
