atk-s0504a:1715_6: yesamevaṃ siyā “māro nāma mahānubhāvo chakāmāvacarissaro vasavattī,
atk-s0504a:1715_7: brahmā pana tatopi mahānubhāvataro dasahi aṅgulīhi dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu ālokaṃ pharati,
atk-s0504a:1715_9: Puthū ca samaṇabrāhmaṇā iddhimanto dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduno mahānubhāvā saṃvijjanti.
atk-s0504a:1715_11: kimetesaṃ sabbesaṃyeva visayo anavasesato bhagavatā abhisambuddho”ti?
atk-s0504a:1716_4: Evaṃ sabbepi tibhavūpage satte tīsu padesu pakkhipitvā puna dvīhi padehi pariyādiyanto “sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāyā”ti āha.
atk-s0504a:1716_5: Evaṃ pañcahipi padehi khandhattayaparicchinne sabbasatte pariyādiyati.
atk-s0504a:1717_0: Yasmā taṃ tathāgatena abhisambuddhanti iminā idaṃ dasseti –
atk-s0504a:1717_1: yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa “nīlaṃ pītaka”ntiādi rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0504a:1717_2: taṃ sabbaṃ “ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma rūpārammaṇaṃ disvā sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto”ti tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1717_3: Tathā yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa “bherisaddo mudiṅgasaddo”tiādi saddārammaṇaṃ sotadvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0504a:1717_7: “ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusitvā sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto”ti sabbaṃ taṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1718_0: Tathā yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa sukhādibhedaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ manodvāre āpāthamāgacchati,
atk-s0504a:1718_1: “ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma dhammārammaṇaṃ jānitvā sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto”ti sabbaṃ taṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ.
atk-s0504a:1718_2: Evaṃ yaṃ imassa sadevakassa lokassa diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1718_3: taṃ tathāgatena adiṭṭhaṃ vā asutaṃ vā amutaṃ vā aviññātaṃ vā natthi.
atk-s0504a:1718_4: Imassa pana mahājanassa pariyesitvā appattampi atthi,
atk-s0504a:1718_8: Sabbampi tathāgatassa appattaṃ nāma natthi ñāṇena asacchikataṃ.
atk-s0504a:1718_9: Tato eva yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthamāgacchantaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0504a:1718_10: taṃ bhagavā sabbaṃ sabbākārena jānāti passati.
atk-s0504a:1718_11: Evaṃ jānatā passatā cānena taṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādivasena vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu labbhamānapadavasena vā “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ?
atk-s0504a:1718_12: Yaṃ rūpaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ pītaka”ntiādinā nayena
atk-s0504a:1718_13: anekehi nāmehi terasahi vārehi dvepaññāsāya nayehi vibhajjamānaṃ tatheva hoti,
atk-s0504a:1719_0: Tasmā tathāgatoti vuccatīti yaṃ yathā lokena gataṃ,
atk-s0504a:1719_4: Iminā tathādassibhāvato tathāgatoti ayamattho dassito hoti.
atk-s0504a:1725_3: sadevamanussāya pajāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā,
atk-s0504a:1726_2: rattiṃ tathāgato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhatīti yassañca visākhapuṇṇamarattiyaṃ tathā āgatādiatthena
atk-s0504a:1726_3: tathāgato bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe aparājitapallaṅke nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā uttaritarābhāvato
atk-s0504a:1726_4: anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ āsavakkhayañāṇena saddhiṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ adhigacchati.
atk-s0504a:1726_5: Yañca rattiṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyatīti yassañca visākhapuṇṇamarattiyaṃyeva kusinārāyaṃ
atk-s0504a:1726_6: upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane yamakasālānamantare anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati.
atk-s0504a:1726_7: Yaṃ etasmiṃ antareti imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ saupādisesaanupādisesanibbānadhātūnaṃ vemajjhe pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇe kāle paṭhamabodhiyampi,
atk-s0504a:1726_9: pacchimabodhiyampi yaṃ suttageyyādippabhedaṃ dhammaṃ bhāsati niddisanavasena,
atk-s0504a:1726_12: Sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hotīti taṃ etthantare desitaṃ sabbaṃ suttageyyādinavaṅgaṃ buddhavacanaṃ atthato byañjanato
atk-s0504a:1726_13: ca anupavajjaṃ anūnaṃ anadhikaṃ sabbākāraparipuṇṇaṃ rāgamadanimmadanaṃ…pe…
atk-s0504a:1726_16: ekamuddikāya lañchitaṃ viya ekanāḷiyā mitaṃ viya ekatulāya tulitaṃ viya ca taṃ tatheva hoti yassatthāya bhāsitaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1726_23: Gadaattho ayaṃ gatasaddo dakārassa takāraṃ katvā,
atk-s0504a:1726_27: Tatho aviparīto āgado yassāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti evamettha padasiddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0504a:1727_0: Yathāvādī tathākārīti ye dhamme bhagavā “ime dhammā akusalā sāvajjā viññugarahitā samattā samādinnā ahitāya
atk-s0504a:1727_1: dukkhāya saṃvattantī”ti paresaṃ dhammaṃ desento vadati,
atk-s0504a:1727_3: Ye pana dhamme bhagavā “ime dhammā kusalā anavajjā viññuppasatthā samattā samādinnā hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantī”ti vadati,
atk-s0504a:1727_4: te dhamme ekanteneva sayaṃ upasampajja vihāsi.
atk-s0504a:1727_7: Yathākārī tathāvādīti sammadeva sīlādiparipūraṇavasena sammā paṭipanno sayaṃ yathākārī bhagavā,
atk-s0504a:1727_8: tatheva dhammadesanāya paresaṃ tattha patiṭṭhāpanavasena tathāvādī.
atk-s0504a:1728_0: Abhibhū anabhibhūtoti upari bhavaggaṃ heṭṭhā avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu
atk-s0504a:1728_1: bhagavā sabbasatte abhibhavati sīlenapi samādhināpi paññāyapi vimuttiyāpi vimuttiñāṇadassanenapi,
atk-s0504a:1728_2: na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi,
atk-s0504a:1728_3: asamo asamasamo appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo atulo appameyyo anuttaro dhammarājā devānaṃ atidevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā.
atk-s0504a:1728_4: Tato eva sayaṃ na kenaci abhibhūtoti anabhibhūto.
atk-s0504a:1728_7: sabbaṃ taṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya passatīti daso.
atk-s0504a:1728_9: bhāvaññathattūpanayavasena saṅkhāre sabbākārena suciṇṇavasitāya samāpattiyo cittañca vase vattetīti vasavattī.
atk-s0504a:1728_10: Ettāvatā abhibhavanaṭṭhena bhagavā attano tathāgatabhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0504a:1729_4: Teneva hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko viya dibbāgadena sappe,
atk-s0504a:1729_6: Iti sabbalokābhibhavane tatho aviparīto desanāvilāso ceva puññussayo ca agado assāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti veditabbo.
atk-s0504a:1730_1: Sabbaloke yathātathanti tasmiṃ tedhātukalokasannivāse yaṃkiñci neyyaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1730_3: Sabbalokavisaṃyuttoti catunnaṃ yogānaṃ anavasesappahānena sabbenapi lokena visaṃyutto vippamutto.
atk-s0504a:1730_4: Anūpayoti sabbasmimpi loke taṇhādiṭṭhiupayehi anūpayo tehi upayehi virahito.
atk-s0504a:1731_4: Sabbaganthappamocanoti sabbe abhijjhākāyaganthādike mocetvā ṭhito veneyyasantānepi attano desanāvilāsena tesaṃ pamocanato sabbaganthappamocano.
atk-s0504a:1731_11: Atha vā paramā santīti uttamā santi.
atk-s0504a:1731_13: Yasmā pana nibbāne kutoci bhayaṃ natthi,
atk-s0504a:1732_1: Sabbakammakkhayaṃ pattoti sabbesaṃ kammānaṃ khayaṃ pariyosānaṃ accantābhāvaṃ patto.
atk-s0504a:1732_2: Vimutto upadhisaṅkhayeti upadhisaṅkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne tadārammaṇāya phalavimuttiyā vimutto.
atk-s0504a:1733_2: Taṃ namassantīti taṃ tathāgataṃ te saraṇaṃ gatā devamanussā namassanti.
atk-s0504a:1734_0: Iti imasmiṃ catukkanipāte chaṭṭhe sattame ca sutte vaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0504a:1755_0: Iti taṃ saṅkharontena, yaṃ taṃ adhigataṃ mayā;
atk-s0504a:1760_0: Tasmiṃ sagāravā niccaṃ, hontu sabbepi pāṇino.
